translated: Even though one does not see the nature of the non-existence of what is not present in perception, it is said to be from inference.

analyzed: de mthong nyid na zhes bya ba'o // mngon sum med na 'brel pa 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yang mi srid do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúwhen one sees that.‚Äù

original: rjes dpag de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes dpag de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no perception, then because there is no apprehension of the connection, inference is also impossible. This is what is taught by ‚Äúthat inference also.‚Äù

original: 'on te rig pa las gzhan pa'i rig bya med pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te rig pa las gzhan pa'i rig bya med pa yin la /
translated: But if there is no object of cognition other than cognition,üîΩand thus the performance of an action and the object of the action are included in cognition itself, then the connection with that is the Sugata.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa dang don byed pa yang rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa bde bar gshegs pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa dang don byed pa yang rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa bde bar gshegs pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: rang dngos rang dmigs rnam pa ni //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang dngos rang dmigs rnam pa ni //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The nature of itself is observed.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam rig pa dag gi gzhan dang gzhan du rig pa ma yin pa las de gnyis las yod pa'i 'brel pa rig par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam rig pa dag gi gzhan dang gzhan du rig pa ma yin pa las de gnyis las yod pa'i 'brel pa rig par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the mere awareness of its own nature is not the awareness of the other, and that the relation of existence between those two is not made known.

original: 'ba' zhig ni 'brel pa 'dzin par mi nus pa mngon sum 'ba' zhig ni ma yin la /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni 'brel pa 'dzin par mi nus pa mngon sum 'ba' zhig ni ma yin la /
translated: Not only that, but also: Direct perception alone is not able to apprehend a relation.

original: de'i khyad par 'dzin par mi nus pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i khyad par 'dzin par mi nus pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of it is not able to apprehend its distinction is taught.

original: yul dang dus gzhan khyab par ni //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yul dang dus gzhan khyab par ni // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It does not pervade other places and times.

original: gang du 'brel pa 'dzin par byed pa yin pa der yang khyab pa ma bzung ba las tshad ma ma yin na /
analyzed: gang du 'brel pa 'dzin par byed pa yin pa der yang khyab pa ma bzung ba las tshad ma ma yin na /
translated: If it is not a valid cognition because it does not apprehend the pervasion of the relation,üîΩwhat need is there to mention that it does not apprehend the relation itself?

original: gang du 'brel pa yang mi 'dzin pa la ni smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: gang du 'brel pa yang mi 'dzin pa la ni smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
translated: With this idea in mind, he says:

original: khyab min lhan cig 'gyur gang yin //üîΩzhes smos so //
analyzed: khyab min lhan cig 'gyur gang yin // zhes smos so //
translated: That which does not pervade is not simultaneous.

original: lhan cig pa nyid du re zhig 'di dag gis mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: lhan cig pa nyid du re zhig 'di dag gis mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: Are these not seen to be simultaneous?

original: gang du yang @78a * //
analyzed: gang du yang @78a * //
translated: In what way?

original: 'khrul par ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'khrul par ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: We do not see it to be mistaken.

original: mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is seen,

original: nges pa med do //
analyzed: nges pa med do //
translated: there is no certainty.

original: de nyid kyis na the tshom yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na the tshom yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is doubt because of that,

original: 'khrul par ma mthong ba khyad par can dang lhan cig pa ma mthong ba mang po las de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //üîΩ'di ni 'di la nges pa yin no zhes nges pa yin pa des na /
analyzed: 'khrul par ma mthong ba khyad par can dang lhan cig pa ma mthong ba mang po las de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no // 'di ni 'di la nges pa yin no zhes nges pa yin pa des na /
translated: it is not so, since there is much non-perception of a special non-perception together with error.üîΩIf you think that it is certainty because of the thought, ‚ÄúThis is certain in this,‚Äù

original: don gyis go ba dang lhan cig pa'i mngon sum la khyab pa nges par 'gyur ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /üîΩyul sogs bzung ba med par ni //
analyzed: don gyis go ba dang lhan cig pa'i mngon sum la khyab pa nges par 'gyur ba yin no snyam du sems pa la / yul sogs bzung ba med par ni //
translated: then there is the ascertainment of the pervasion together with the inference.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to that, he says,üîΩWithout the apprehension of an object, etc.

original: 'khrul pa ni gal te ma bzung ba yin yang yul ma bzung ba yin na de'i med pa nyid rig par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa ni gal te ma bzung ba yin yang yul ma bzung ba yin na de'i med pa nyid rig par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If error is not apprehended, even if it is not apprehended, the non-apprehension of the object does not make one understand its non-existence.

original: yod kyang rig bya ni ma yin no //üîΩde nyid kyis na the tshom yin //
analyzed: yod kyang rig bya ni ma yin no // de nyid kyis na the tshom yin //
translated: Even if it exists, it is not to be understood.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúIt is doubt because of that.‚Äù

original: de'i bya ba ni yul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni yul la sogs pa'o //
translated: Its activity is the object, etc.

original: de lta na yang tha snyad pa rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs par byed pa nyid dang / de las bzlog pa tshad ma ma yin pa nyid las gzhan pa ma mthong ba'i phyir khas blang bar bya ba yin par tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis go rims bzhin du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta na yang tha snyad pa rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs par byed pa nyid dang / de las bzlog pa tshad ma ma yin pa nyid las gzhan pa ma mthong ba'i phyir khas blang bar bya ba yin par tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis go rims bzhin du bstan pa ni /
translated: Nevertheless, because it is not to be transcended by the conventional, it is the very means of understanding, and because nothing else is seen that is the opposite of that, i.e. , non-valid cognition, it is to be accepted. This is taught in two verses, respectively.

original: de phyir rang las tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: de phyir rang las tshad ma nyid //
translated: Therefore, it is valid cognition from itself.

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is the verse.

original: de la re zhig gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa nyid tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: de la re zhig gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa nyid tshad ma yin na /
translated: Now, if the very non-erroneous cognition is valid cognition,

original: skyes pa'i dus su tshad ma dang cig shos dag mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skyes pa'i dus su tshad ma dang cig shos dag mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: the verse shows that at the time of arising, valid cognition and the other are the same:

original: gnod pa med pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By mere non-erroneousness,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: this is the verse.

original: 'jug pa'i dus phyis gnod pa med pa nyid du ni sngar ma nges pa yin na /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i dus phyis gnod pa med pa nyid du ni sngar ma nges pa yin na /
translated: If non-erroneousness is not ascertained previously, at the time of engagement,

original: ji ltar 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: how can it be the cause of engagement? This is taught:

original: thob pa'i dus su 'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thob pa'i dus su 'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even at the time of attainment.

original: don byed pa la mi bslu ba nyid kyang tshad ma yin la ;
analyzed: don byed pa la mi bslu ba nyid kyang tshad ma yin la ;
translated: And the non-deceptiveness of the object-producer is also a valid cognition.

original: 'jug pa'i snga rol du nges pa med pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i snga rol du nges pa med pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But the absence of certainty prior to engagement is not a component of engagement.

original: de yang rang dngos so zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de yang rang dngos so zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: That is also its own nature.

original: tha snyad pa rnams kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid yin zhes bya ba la rigs pa cir yang med la /
analyzed: tha snyad pa rnams kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba nyid yin zhes bya ba la rigs pa cir yang med la /
translated: There is no reason at all for the conventionalists to not accept that.

original: rigs pas brtags pa na rang las sam gzhan las kyang rung tshad ma nyid du rnam par gnas pa ma yin zhes pa ni phyogs snga ma'o //üîΩgrub pa'i mtha' ni shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo skad cig ma nyid du shes pa tsam nyid la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rigs pas brtags pa na rang las sam gzhan las kyang rung tshad ma nyid du rnam par gnas pa ma yin zhes pa ni phyogs snga ma'o // grub pa'i mtha' ni shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo skad cig ma nyid du shes pa tsam nyid la sogs pa la /
translated: When examined by reason, it does not remain as a valid cognition either from itself or from another.

original: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis gzhal bya la /
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis gzhal bya la /
translated: The tenet is that those who desire liberation should ascertain the object of valid cognition, such as the momentariness of the nature of consciousness,üîΩby means of self-awareness, without relying on anything else.

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa nyid kyis rang rig pas nges pa ni rang nyid las @78b te don dam pa pa'i chad ma nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa nyid kyis rang rig pas nges pa ni rang nyid las @78b te don dam pa pa'i chad ma nyid yin no //
translated: That is the ultimate valid cognition.

original: phyi rol la ni thob bya dang 'brel pa la sogs pa gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir rang rig pa ma yin pa la thog ma med pa'i bag chags las skyes pa'i tha snyad kyi ming can gyi rnam par rtog pa de gtso bor 'gyur ba'i rjes su dpag
analyzed: phyi rol la ni thob bya dang 'brel pa la sogs pa gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir rang rig pa ma yin pa la thog ma med pa'i bag chags las skyes pa'i tha snyad kyi ming can gyi rnam par rtog pa de gtso bor 'gyur ba'i rjes su dpag
translated: Therefore, the conceptual thought that arises from beginningless latent potentialities and is designated by conventional terms is not reflexive awareness.

original: pas rtogs pa ni gzhan las te /
analyzed: pas rtogs pa ni gzhan las te /
translated: The realization of the primary nature is from other.

original: don dam pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: don dam pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not the ultimate.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not realized by valid knowledge such as perception.

original: 'di las ni ji ltar mthong ba las de kho na nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir gnyi ga tsug kyang rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di las ni ji ltar mthong ba las de kho na nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir gnyi ga tsug kyang rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This text teaches that both reasonings are correct because reality is posited in accordance with what is seen.

original: 'dir bstan pa /
analyzed: 'dir bstan pa /
translated: The teaching here is:

original: rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of things is realized from itself.

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid tshad mar grub pa yin par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid tshad mar grub pa yin par ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not correct that the nature of consciousness is established by valid knowledge.

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo'i yang sngon po la sogs par ni bde ba la sogs pa rigs pa'i dus su rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo'i yang sngon po la sogs par ni bde ba la sogs pa rigs pa'i dus su rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the nature of another is also not the nature of consciousness, because at the time of knowing blue, pleasure and so on are not known.

original: bde ba bzhin du shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo rig pa nyid ni sngon po la sogs pa'i don byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba bzhin du shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo rig pa nyid ni sngon po la sogs pa'i don byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of consciousness that knows pleasure is not the function of an object such as blue,

original: phyi rol nyid ni gang las de'i byed po nyid yod pa yin zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol nyid ni gang las de'i byed po nyid yod pa yin zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not be external, and it would not be the case that it exists as its agent.

original: gang las rang gi ngo bo rig pa las gzhan pa de la don byed pa gang yin pa de'i don du tha snyad 'dogs pa po rtogs pa yang 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: gang las rang gi ngo bo rig pa las gzhan pa de la don byed pa gang yin pa de'i don du tha snyad 'dogs pa po rtogs pa yang 'jug pa yin la /
translated: The one who imputes the convention of the function of that which is other than the knower of its own nature is the one who engages in understanding.

original: de la ltos pa'i byed pa po nyid yin pa ni rig par byed pa'i byed po las gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzung bya sngon po'i ngo bo bzhin du rtogs pa med pa don dam pa pa nyid yin no snyamüîΩdu sems pa la /
analyzed: de la ltos pa'i byed pa po nyid yin pa ni rig par byed pa'i byed po las gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzung bya sngon po'i ngo bo bzhin du rtogs pa med pa don dam pa pa nyid yin no snyamüîΩdu sems pa la /
translated: The one who is the agent that depends on that is other than the agent that is the knower, and therefore, like the nature of the apprehended blue that is not similar to pleasure, it is understood to be ultimately nonexistent.

original: rang las ni rang gi ngo bo nyid rtogs kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang las ni rang gi ngo bo nyid rtogs kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúOne realizes one‚Äôs own nature from oneself.‚Äù

original: bde ba bzhin du sngon po yang rang rig pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: bde ba bzhin du sngon po yang rang rig pa kho na yin te /
translated: Like pleasure, blue is also reflexive awareness,

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference.

original: phan tshun pa'i bya ba med pa'i phyir rang rig pa nyid las mi gzhan pa'i don byed pa ni bde ba bzhin du rang gi rgyud kyi don byed pa la 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phan tshun pa'i bya ba med pa'i phyir rang rig pa nyid las mi gzhan pa'i don byed pa ni bde ba bzhin du rang gi rgyud kyi don byed pa la 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, because there is no mutual activity, there is no contradiction in the activity of the object that is not different from reflexive awareness itself, like pleasure, being the activity of the continuum of the self.

original: ci las shes she na /
analyzed: ci las shes she na /
translated: How is this known?

original: dbang po la brten pa ni mngon sum mo zhes bya ba'i don ni brten pa nyid yin par bsgrubs pa yin yang mngon sum gyi sgra ni mngon du byed pa'i mtshan nyid du ston pa yin la /
analyzed: dbang po la brten pa ni mngon sum mo zhes bya ba'i don ni brten pa nyid yin par bsgrubs pa yin yang mngon sum gyi sgra ni mngon du byed pa'i mtshan nyid du ston pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúdirect perception is based on the sense faculties‚Äù is that it is established as being based on the sense faculties. The term ‚Äúdirect perception‚Äù indicates that it is characterized by being manifest.

original: mngon du byed pa yang lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa yang lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Being manifest is not being hidden.

original: yang dag par rig pa las gzhan pa dang / dus gzhan pa yang phyi rol ni lkog tu ma gyur pa mi srid par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yang dag par rig pa las gzhan pa dang / dus gzhan pa yang phyi rol ni lkog tu ma gyur pa mi srid par bstan pa ni /
translated: The term ‚Äúexternal‚Äù indicates that it is impossible for something to be hidden from perfect knowledge, something other than that, or something else.

original: mngon sum ni mngon du rtogs pa yin no zhes @79a * //
analyzed: mngon sum ni mngon du rtogs pa yin no zhes @79a * //
translated: Direct perception is the clear realization.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: skad cig ma nyid kyi shes pa tsam la sogs pa bzhin du thob bya dang 'brel pa can nyid kyang shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa des na /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid kyi shes pa tsam la sogs pa bzhin du thob bya dang 'brel pa can nyid kyang shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa des na /
translated: Just as the mere consciousness of momentariness, etc., is related to the object to be attained, so too is the very nature of consciousness.

original: ji ltar mngon du mi byed pa zhes bya ba yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon du mi byed pa zhes bya ba yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Therefore, how can it be said that it does not manifest?

original: thob par bya ba'i don ma bzung bar ni zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i don ma bzung bar ni zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúWithout apprehending the object to be attained,‚Äù etc.

original: yul la sogs pa la me dang 'brel pa can nyid bzhin du shes pa yang phrad bya dang 'brel pa can nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo ma yin la /
analyzed: yul la sogs pa la me dang 'brel pa can nyid bzhin du shes pa yang phrad bya dang 'brel pa can nyid ni gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo ma yin la /
translated: Just as the relation to fire, etc. is not the very nature of the object, because it depends on something else, so too the relation to the object of experience is not the very nature of consciousness.

original: de nyid rig pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de nyid rig pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not itself the awareness of that.

original: rig par byed par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis rang las sam gzhan las kyang rung tshad ma nyid yin pa mi srid do //
analyzed: rig par byed par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis rang las sam gzhan las kyang rung tshad ma nyid yin pa mi srid do //
translated: And because it does not become the awareness of that, it is impossible that it be valid cognition, either by itself or in dependence on something else.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: gang zhig gang gi tshe yod pa de'i tshe de yod par nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi tshe yod pa de'i tshe de yod par nges pa yin gyi /
translated: When something exists at a certain time, it is certain that it exists at that time.

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not exist at another time.

original: lkog tu gyur pa rnams ni yod par nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa rnams ni yod par nges pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not certain that hidden things exist.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thob bya la gnod par byed pa de'i med pa yang /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thob bya la gnod par byed pa de'i med pa yang /
translated: The nonexistence of that which obstructs the object to be obtained in the future

original: dus de nyid kyi tshe yin pa des na sngar ni gnod pa med pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid can gyi tshad ma nyid dang / cig shos kyang rang las rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dus de nyid kyi tshe yin pa des na sngar ni gnod pa med pa nyid kyis mtshan nyid can gyi tshad ma nyid dang / cig shos kyang rang las rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: is also at that very time. Therefore, since there is no obstruction previously, it is valid knowledge that has the characteristic of non-obstruction, and the other is not understood from itself.

original: de lta mod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: However, it is said to be its own nature.

original: thob bya'i don 'dzin pa med na de dang 'brel pa 'dzin pa yang med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: thob bya'i don 'dzin pa med na de dang 'brel pa 'dzin pa yang med pa'i phyir la /
translated: If there is no apprehension of the object to be obtained, there is also no apprehension of that which is related to it,

original: des na de la thob bya dang 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: des na de la thob bya dang 'brel pa yin la /
translated: and therefore it is shown that it is related to that which is to be obtained,

original: thob bya yang der nye ba yin par bstan to //
analyzed: thob bya yang der nye ba yin par bstan to //
translated: and that which is to be obtained is also close to it.

original: 'on te tshad ma nyid rang gi ngo bo yin na /
analyzed: 'on te tshad ma nyid rang gi ngo bo yin na /
translated: But if valid knowledge itself is its own nature,

original: 'brel pa can gyi ngo bo nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi ngo bo nyid du brjod do //
translated: it is said to be the nature of that which is related.

original: 'brel pa can tsam ni 'brel pa yin zhes bya ba ni zlos pa nyid ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa can tsam ni 'brel pa yin zhes bya ba ni zlos pa nyid ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a tautology to say that a related object is a relation.üîΩThe reply is:

original: lan ni / thob bya'i rang bzhin dang 'brel pa'i //
analyzed: lan ni / thob bya'i rang bzhin dang 'brel pa'i //
translated: The nature of the object to be attained is related to

original: shes pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the nature of the cognition.

original: gang la 'brel pa yod pa de ni 'brel pa can yin te /
analyzed: gang la 'brel pa yod pa de ni 'brel pa can yin te /
translated: That which has a relation is a related object.

original: gzhan gyis nye bar byas pa'i dngos po yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyis nye bar byas pa'i dngos po yin gyi /
translated: It is a thing that is produced by another.

original: dngos po tsam ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po tsam ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not merely a thing.

original: gzhan gyis nye bar byas pa med na shes pa tsam ni tshad mas rnam par gzhag pa mi thob pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis nye bar byas pa med na shes pa tsam ni tshad mas rnam par gzhag pa mi thob pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The mere cognition cannot be established by a valid cognition if it is not produced by another. This is demonstrated:

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam zhig ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam zhig ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mere nature of itself.

original: de zhes bya ba ni tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni tshad ma nyid do //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to valid cognition.

original: thob bya nye bar byas pa ma yin na shes pa'i ngo bo nyid du yang mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: thob bya nye bar byas pa ma yin na shes pa'i ngo bo nyid du yang mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the object to be attained is not produced by another, is it not reasonable that it is the nature of the cognition itself?

original: 'di shes pas shes pa'am /
analyzed: 'di shes pas shes pa'am /
translated: Is it known by this cognition or not?

original: 'di shes par byed pas shes pa zhes shes bya la gnas pa nyid yin zhes rjod par byed pa'i phyir ji ltar @79b rang gi ngo bo nyid tshad ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di shes par byed pas shes pa zhes shes bya la gnas pa nyid yin zhes rjod par byed pa'i phyir ji ltar @79b rang gi ngo bo nyid tshad ma yin zhing /
translated: How can it be a valid cognition in terms of its own nature?

original: ji ltar de'i ngo bo nyid tshad ma ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i ngo bo nyid tshad ma ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: How can its nature not be a valid cognition?

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni tshad ma ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /üîΩshes pa ni rang nyid dam /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni tshad ma ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te / shes pa ni rang nyid dam /
translated: With regard to this, it says, ‚ÄúThe nature of consciousness is not a valid cognition.‚ÄùüîΩConsciousness is not a valid cognition in terms of itself.

original: rang gi yul yang rung /
analyzed: rang gi yul yang rung /
translated: Nor is it a valid cognition in terms of its object.

original: de dag tsam gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag tsam gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a valid cognition in terms of those alone.

original: de tsam ni thams cad la yod pas tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de tsam ni thams cad la yod pas tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir la /
translated: Since those alone exist for everything, there is no distinction between valid cognition and what is not valid cognition.

original: thob bya yod pa dang med pa dag gis rnam par dbye ba las de dang 'brel pa nyid tshad ma nyid yin la /
analyzed: thob bya yod pa dang med pa dag gis rnam par dbye ba las de dang 'brel pa nyid tshad ma nyid yin la /
translated: It is a valid cognition in terms of its relation to the object of attainment, which is distinguished by existence and nonexistence.üîΩThe other is the opposite.

original: gzhan ni gzhan du yin zhes rnam par gzhag par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni gzhan du yin zhes rnam par gzhag par byed pa yin te /
translated: This is the presentation.

original: der yang bshad zin to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der yang bshad zin to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: gal te thar pa'i don du tshad ma la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci'i don du 'bad nas spong bar byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te thar pa'i don du tshad ma la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci'i don du 'bad nas spong bar byed ce na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúFor the sake of what is one to strive in the analysis of valid cognitions and so on?‚Äù

original: de las 'jug pa dang ldog pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de las 'jug pa dang ldog pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: [The answer is:] ‚ÄúIn order to engage and disengage from that.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang gnod pa med pa nyid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gnod pa med pa nyid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the mere absence of harm is not valid cognition,

original: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because it is not worldly.

original: mi bslu ba can nyid ni tha snyad pa yin pa'i phyir 'gyur ba yin par ni /
analyzed: mi bslu ba can nyid ni tha snyad pa yin pa'i phyir 'gyur ba yin par ni /
translated: But the fact that it is nondeceptive is conventional, and so it is.

original: tshad ma mi slu ba can zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad ma mi slu ba can zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: This is indicated by the phrase ‚Äúvalid cognition is nondeceptive.‚Äù

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: mi slu ba can nyid ni phyi rol gyi don la ma yin te /
analyzed: mi slu ba can nyid ni phyi rol gyi don la ma yin te /
translated: Nondeceptiveness does not apply to external objects,

original: the tshom yin pas rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom yin pas rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are posited through doubt.

original: rnam par rig pa tsam du smra ba la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa tsam du smra ba la yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor does it apply to the Proponents of Consciousness,

original: snga ma dang phyi ma dag gi shes pa dag gi 'brel pa ni de dag gis sam gzhan gyis kyang shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma dag gi shes pa dag gi 'brel pa ni de dag gis sam gzhan gyis kyang shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the connection between the earlier and later consciousnesses cannot be known by them or anyone else.

original: gnod pa med pa nyid kyi shes pa ni rang nyid kho na las nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa nyid kyi shes pa ni rang nyid kho na las nges pa yin gyi /
translated: A nondefective consciousness is ascertained from itself alone.

original: gzhan sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not prove anything else.

original: sngon po'i zhes bya bar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid la nang du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan la gnas pa ma yin sngon por rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i zhes bya bar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid la nang du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan la gnas pa ma yin sngon por rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is not based on something else, because it engages the nature of apprehending blue. It causes the understanding of blue.

original: dbang po'i bya ba las snga ma ni phyis 'byung ba'i dngos po las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: dbang po'i bya ba las snga ma ni phyis 'byung ba'i dngos po las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the former, which is the activity of the sense faculty, different from the latter, which is the arising of the entity?üîΩTherefore, the nature that arises in between is not hidden.

original: des na bar du 'byung ba'i ngo bo lkog tu ma gyur pa ni 'di'o zhes brjod do //
analyzed: des na bar du 'byung ba'i ngo bo lkog tu ma gyur pa ni 'di'o zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúThis is it.‚Äù

original: bden te / gal te de yang de dang 'dra ba'i nga rgyal med na /
analyzed: bden te / gal te de yang de dang 'dra ba'i nga rgyal med na /
translated: It is true that if it is not the pride that is like that,

original: de tsam gyi nga rgyal byed pa gnyis kyi ngo bo las 'di la gnyis dag tu rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de tsam gyi nga rgyal byed pa gnyis kyi ngo bo las 'di la gnyis dag tu rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: the pride that is merely that does not express the two natures of the two.

original: de yang gang gi phyir de ni spyi'i yul dang 'brel pa can sngon mngon sum du dmigs par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir de ni spyi'i yul dang 'brel pa can sngon mngon sum du dmigs par byed pa yin la /
translated: It is also the case that it is related to a general object and causes the prior to be observed by direct perception.

original: phyi'i yul yang 'dzin par byed pa la ltos nas yin te /
analyzed: phyi'i yul yang 'dzin par byed pa la ltos nas yin te /
translated: Also, external objects are posited in dependence on the apprehender.

original: de'i phyir phyi rol zhes 'dir 'di //üîΩ'dzin byed @80a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi rol zhes 'dir 'di // 'dzin byed @80a * //
translated: Therefore, here, external isüîΩdistinguished from the apprehending

original: cha las phye ba yin //
analyzed: cha las phye ba yin //
translated: aspect.

original: rig bya sngon po ser po sogs //üîΩmngon sum la sogs par bstan yin //
analyzed: rig bya sngon po ser po sogs // mngon sum la sogs par bstan yin //
translated: The objects of awareness, such as blue and yellow,

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: are taught to be direct perception, and so on.

original: phyi rol nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa la ltos nas yin la /
analyzed: phyi rol nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa la ltos nas yin la /
translated: External is posited in dependence on the apprehender.

original: de 'dzin pa med na ji ltar gzung byar 'gyur /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa med na ji ltar gzung byar 'gyur /
translated: If there is no apprehender, how can there be an apprehended?

original: phyi rol nyid kyis yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol nyid kyis yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that external is posited by external itself,

original: mi rigs te ;
analyzed: mi rigs te ;
translated: that is illogical.

original: phyi rol nyid rig pa ni 'dzin pa po'i nyams su myong ba la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: phyi rol nyid rig pa ni 'dzin pa po'i nyams su myong ba la ltos pa yin la /
translated: External itself is posited in dependence on the experience of the apprehender.

original: de'i nyams su myong ba yang de'i rig pa las yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i nyams su myong ba yang de'i rig pa las yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that experience is posited in dependence on the awareness of that.

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: sngon po bzhin du bdag go zhes 'dzin par byed pa ni rtogs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: sngon po bzhin du bdag go zhes 'dzin par byed pa ni rtogs pa nyid yin te /
translated: The apprehender is the cognition that thinks, ‚ÄúI am like blue.‚Äù

original: sngon por bdag gis shes so zhes nyams su myong ba po'i nyams su myong bar bya ba las gzhan pa nyid kho nar yod pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon por bdag gis shes so zhes nyams su myong ba po'i nyams su myong bar bya ba las gzhan pa nyid kho nar yod pa yin no //
translated: But the experience of the experiencer is something other than the experience itself.

original: ci las shes zhe na /
analyzed: ci las shes zhe na /
translated: How do we know this?

original: re zhig gnyi ga rig par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: re zhig gnyi ga rig par byed pa yin te /
translated: First, both are known.

original: rgyu yang de'i shugs kyis rtogs par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyu yang de'i shugs kyis rtogs par byed pa yin la /
translated: The cause is known by implication.

original: de bzhin du sngon por nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni du ba ni me'i bya ba yin pa bzhin du goms pa yin na mthong ba kho na las nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon por nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni du ba ni me'i bya ba yin pa bzhin du goms pa yin na mthong ba kho na las nges pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, the experience of blue is the cause of the memory of blue, just as smoke is the cause of the memory of fire.

original: bsnyon pas 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsnyon pas 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to deny this.

original: 'di nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kho na ma rig pa'i dbang gis phyir rol bzhin du 'jog bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba 'di yang mnga' skyel bas bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kho na ma rig pa'i dbang gis phyir rol bzhin du 'jog bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba 'di yang mnga' skyel bas bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: The experience itself is posited as external due to the power of ignorance. This is also something that must be established by inference.

original: gnyis nyid nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis nyid nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the duality is experienced.

original: nyams su myong ba med na yang /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba med na yang /
translated: Even if there is no experience,

original: bag chags med na ma rig pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags med na ma rig pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if there were no latent impressions, ignorance would not occur.

original: tha dad pa'i de lta bu'i bag chags kyis bskyed bya ni rnam par rtog pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i de lta bu'i bag chags kyis bskyed bya ni rnam par rtog pa ma yin nam /
translated: And is not the object of such latent impressions that are different from it a conceptual thought?

original: de yang des bskyed bya yin zhes phan tshun rgyu nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yang des bskyed bya yin zhes phan tshun rgyu nyid yin te /
translated: And that is also produced by that, so they are mutually causal,

original: sa bon dag myu gu lta bu'o //
analyzed: sa bon dag myu gu lta bu'o //
translated: like seeds and sprouts.

original: de ltar yang mthong ba ni dngul ma yin pa la dngul du shes pa la'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang mthong ba ni dngul ma yin pa la dngul du shes pa la'o //
translated: And that is seen in the case of the cognition of silver in a shell.

original: dngul gyi rnam pa ni de la don med pa'i phyir dang gnyi ga ma yin pa med pa'i phyir shes pa'i bag chags yod pa'i dbang gis phyi rol bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: dngul gyi rnam pa ni de la don med pa'i phyir dang gnyi ga ma yin pa med pa'i phyir shes pa'i bag chags yod pa'i dbang gis phyi rol bzhin du zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: The form of silver is not the object of that cognition, because both are nonexistent. Therefore it is not reasonable to say that the latent impressions of cognition exist by the power of external objects,

original: bden pa'i dngul gyi rnam pa bzhin du 'di'i yang shes pa las phyi rol nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir bden pa dang mi bden pa'i rnam par dbye ba nyid nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa dag gis de bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: bden pa'i dngul gyi rnam pa bzhin du 'di'i yang shes pa las phyi rol nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir bden pa dang mi bden pa'i rnam par dbye ba nyid nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa dag gis de bstan pa yin te /
translated: because the form of true silver is understood to be external to cognition, just as it is, and because the distinction between the true and the false is taught by proximity and nonproximity.

original: dbang pos 'thob min par bdag 'dod //
analyzed: dbang pos 'thob min par bdag 'dod //
translated: The self is not obtained by the senses, as we maintain.

original: ces bya ba yin te /üîΩnye ba ma yin pa ji ltar dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: ces bya ba yin te / nye ba ma yin pa ji ltar dmigs pa yin /
translated: How can something that is not present be an object of apprehension?

original: gal te don nye ba ma yin pa de lta na kho bo cag gi phyogs la ci'i phyir ldog par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te don nye ba ma yin pa de lta na kho bo cag gi phyogs la ci'i phyir ldog par 'gyur /
translated: If it is not present, then why does it follow that our position is undermined?

original: @80b bden pa'i shes pa la ni so sor snang ba nye bo dgos pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: @80b bden pa'i shes pa la ni so sor snang ba nye bo dgos pa can yin gyi /
translated: In the case of a cognition of reality, the presence of a distinct object is required,

original: rang gi ngo bos nye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos nye ba ma yin no //
translated: but it is not present by virtue of its own nature.

original: bden pa'i rgyu dmigs pa ni mi bden par mngon par 'dod pa la yang de ma nyams pa'i phyir bag chags kyi nus pa shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bden pa'i rgyu dmigs pa ni mi bden par mngon par 'dod pa la yang de ma nyams pa'i phyir bag chags kyi nus pa shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if one maintains that the cause of reality is not a real object, since that is not undermined, the capacity of latent potentialities is not a cognition.

original: de lta na shes pa las snga ba'i dngos po yod pa las tshad ma yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na shes pa las snga ba'i dngos po yod pa las tshad ma yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, a valid cognition does not exist in a thing that is prior to cognition,

original: shes pa'i dus tsam na byung ba ni shes pa kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i dus tsam na byung ba ni shes pa kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would be like a cognition that arises at the time of cognition itself.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: gang gi phyir sngon po'i dngos po ni res 'ga' zhig rtogs par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po'i dngos po ni res 'ga' zhig rtogs par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the thing blue is sometimes the cause of understanding,

original: de dbang po tsam las byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dbang po tsam las byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: but it does not arise from the sense faculty alone.

original: de yod kyang res 'ga' med pa'i phyir dang / de nyid kyis na yul gzhan pa tsam las byung ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de yod kyang res 'ga' med pa'i phyir dang / de nyid kyis na yul gzhan pa tsam las byung ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Even if it exists, it is sometimes not perceived, and for that very reason, it is not produced from a mere different object.

original: des na de bzhin du dbang po dang / yul gzhan mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dang / bag chags dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pas sngon po sgrub par byed pa rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: des na de bzhin du dbang po dang / yul gzhan mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dang / bag chags dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pas sngon po sgrub par byed pa rtogs pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, in the same way, when a cognition is produced from a blue object, it is a cognition of blue, because it is produced by a blue object, and because it is produced by a similar potentiality.

original: sngon po rtogs pa yin gyi de med pa las thal ches pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po rtogs pa yin gyi de med pa las thal ches pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If it were a cognition of blue, even when there is no blue, it would be a cognition of blue, even when there is no blue.

original: de'i yang yul gzhan nyid yin pas ma yin pa dgag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i yang yul gzhan nyid yin pas ma yin pa dgag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not the case, because it is a negation of non-blue, since it is a different object.

original: de bzhin nye ba'i dngos po ma rtogs pa yang dbang po'i dbang gis rtogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bzhin nye ba'i dngos po ma rtogs pa yang dbang po'i dbang gis rtogs par 'gyur la /
translated: In the same way, even when a nearby object is not perceived, it becomes perceived due to the sense faculty.

original: bag chags kyi dbang gis nye ba ma yin pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbang gis nye ba ma yin pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: And even when it is not nearby due to the potentiality, it is a distinction.üîΩAnd that is also

original: de yang / don dang shes pa dag gis 'dir ;
analyzed: de yang / don dang shes pa dag gis 'dir ;
translated: Here, by objects and cognitions,

original: / gang zhig tshad ma dang 'brel pa //
analyzed: / gang zhig tshad ma dang 'brel pa //
translated: what is related to valid cognition,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo 'di //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo 'di //
translated: this nature of cause and effect,

original: gzhan du de ltar mthong ba min //
analyzed: gzhan du de ltar mthong ba min //
translated: But it is not seen in any other way.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning of this passage is as follows:

original: bag chags dang dbang po la sogs pa tshogs pa'i dbang gis don rtogs pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni khyad par can du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bag chags dang dbang po la sogs pa tshogs pa'i dbang gis don rtogs pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni khyad par can du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The cognition of an object is characterized by the power of the aggregation of latent impressions, faculties, etc.

original: de las gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i bdag nyid kyang shes pa po'i ngo bo dbang po la sogs pa'i bya ba'i ngo bo ni shes par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de las gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i bdag nyid kyang shes pa po'i ngo bo dbang po la sogs pa'i bya ba'i ngo bo ni shes par byed pa yin la /
translated: The nature of the knower, which is not tenable in any other way, is the nature of the activity of the faculties, etc., which is the cause of cognition.

original: de ni blo yin par brjod do //
analyzed: de ni blo yin par brjod do //
translated: That is called the mind.

original: so sor snang ba nye ba yang de'i kun tu sbyor ba las skyes pa ni mngon sum yin la /
analyzed: so sor snang ba nye ba yang de'i kun tu sbyor ba las skyes pa ni mngon sum yin la /
translated: The presence of individual appearances is produced from its connection. It is direct perception.

original: cig shos ni mngon sum ltar snang ba'am tshad ma gzhan yin pa ni gnod pa can med pa dang yod pa dag las rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: cig shos ni mngon sum ltar snang ba'am tshad ma gzhan yin pa ni gnod pa can med pa dang yod pa dag las rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: The other is like direct perception, or it is another valid cognition. It is the cause of understanding from the absence or presence of an object of negation.

original: gnod pa can gyi shes pa thob pa ni sngar gnod pa med pa yin na mi srid do //
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi shes pa thob pa ni sngar gnod pa med pa yin na mi srid do //
translated: The attainment of a negating cognition is impossible if there is no prior absence of negation.

original: de yod pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par rtogs pa yin na phan tshun rten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yod pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin par rtogs pa yin na phan tshun rten pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is understood that it is not a valid cognition because it exists, then they are not mutually dependent.

original: bag chags las skyes pa'i shes pas ni nye ba la dngul du @81a * //
analyzed: bag chags las skyes pa'i shes pas ni nye ba la dngul du @81a * //
translated: If a cognition that arises from habitual tendencies perceives silver in what is near,

original: rtogs par byed pa yin na nye ba ma yin pa ji ltar yul nyid yin /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa yin na nye ba ma yin pa ji ltar yul nyid yin /
translated: how can what is not near be the object?

original: de nyid kyis na phyin ci log yin par gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na phyin ci log yin par gsal ba yin la /
translated: That very thing makes it clear that it is erroneous.

original: de lta yin par gnod pa can gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin par gnod pa can gyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: That being so, it is understood by a contradicting cognition.

original: sngar dngul yod pa nyid la de ltar rtogs la /
analyzed: sngar dngul yod pa nyid la de ltar rtogs la /
translated: Previously, silver existed, and it was cognized as such.

original: dus phyis de lta ma yin pa'i shes pas de bzhin du mthong na med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus phyis de lta ma yin pa'i shes pas de bzhin du mthong na med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, when a cognition sees it otherwise, it becomes nonexistent.

original: de mthong ba la ni mi rigs pa ma yin na //
analyzed: de mthong ba la ni mi rigs pa ma yin na //
translated: It is not unreasonable to see it as nonexistent.

original: de ma yin pa la yang de'i ngo bor rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de'i med pa rtogs pa'i phyir dran pa med pa las 'jig rten pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ma yin pa la yang de'i ngo bor rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de'i med pa rtogs pa'i phyir dran pa med pa las 'jig rten pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni mi rigs so //
translated: Also, because what is not silver is cognized as having its nature, and because its nonexistence is cognized, it is unreasonable for worldly conceptual cognition to be non-recollective.

original: de yang / 'gal ba rnams ni rigs pa la yang gcig pa yang mi srid de /üîΩgcig gi rnam par gcig 'gyur zhes //
analyzed: de yang / 'gal ba rnams ni rigs pa la yang gcig pa yang mi srid de / gcig gi rnam par gcig 'gyur zhes //
translated: Moreover, it is not possible for contradictions to be the same even in terms of reasoning.

original: dbang phyug gis ni bstan pa min //üîΩzhes smos ba'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug gis ni bstan pa min // zhes smos ba'o //
translated: It is not taught by ƒ™≈õvaraüîΩThat one thing is the transformation of another.

original: gang zhig ji lta ba nyid du dmigs par bya ba de lta de ltar khas blangs bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig ji lta ba nyid du dmigs par bya ba de lta de ltar khas blangs bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Whatever is to be observed as it is should be accepted as it is.

original: de'i phyir sngon po ni shes pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngon po ni shes pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, blue is not the entity of consciousness,

original: nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid las rtogs pas phyir dang ; shes pa mi 'dzin pa la 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / de mi 'dzin pa la shes pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid las rtogs pas phyir dang ; shes pa mi 'dzin pa la 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / de mi 'dzin pa la shes pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is understood from being an object of experience, because it is apprehended when consciousness is not apprehended, and because consciousness is apprehended when it is not apprehended.

original: de'i tshe bdag gi don cung zad kyang bzung bar dran pa med do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe bdag gi don cung zad kyang bzung bar dran pa med do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: At that time, there is no memory of apprehending even the slightest object of self.

original: gzung bya'i ngo bo ma rtogs pa'i 'dzin byed skyes par dran pa'o //
analyzed: gzung bya'i ngo bo ma rtogs pa'i 'dzin byed skyes par dran pa'o //
translated: This is the memory of the arising of the apprehender that does not realize the entity of the object to be apprehended.

original: bzung ba'i don cung zad kyang zhes bya bas don nyid kyi spyi dran pa yin zhes bya bar yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: bzung ba'i don cung zad kyang zhes bya bas don nyid kyi spyi dran pa yin zhes bya bar yang mi rigs te /
translated: It is also unreasonable to say, By 'apprehending even the slightest object,' the memory of the universal of the object itself is meant,

original: don la the tshom za ba'i phyir dang / nges pa med pa'i phyir dang / 'dzin par byed pa la phyin ci log pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la the tshom za ba'i phyir dang / nges pa med pa'i phyir dang / 'dzin par byed pa la phyin ci log pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is doubt about the object, because there is no certainty, and because there is error in the apprehension.

original: de'i rnam pa ma yin pa ji ltar 'dzin par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ma yin pa ji ltar 'dzin par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How can there be apprehension of what is not its form?

original: de'i rnam pa nyid kyang ci'i phyir yin zhes mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nyid kyang ci'i phyir yin zhes mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Why is it not the same for the form of the sense faculty?

original: de las skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de las skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it arises from that.

original: dbang po'i rnam pa nyid kyang yin par 'gyur ro //üîΩde las skye bar bye brag med kyang don gyi rnam pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam pa nyid kyang yin par 'gyur ro // de las skye bar bye brag med kyang don gyi rnam pa nyid yin te /
translated: The form of the sense faculty would also be the object.

original: nye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde lta yin na de nyid kyi nye ba yin pas 'ga' zhig kho na 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nye ba yin pa'i phyir ro // de lta yin na de nyid kyi nye ba yin pas 'ga' zhig kho na 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Although there is no distinction in arising from it, the form of the object is the object because it is present.

original: thams cad kyi ni ma yin zhes rnam par gzhag pa 'grub pa'i phyir de'i rnam pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ni ma yin zhes rnam par gzhag pa 'grub pa'i phyir de'i rnam pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, it would be present only to some, not to all, because the establishment of the presentation would be due to that. Therefore, it is not the form of that.

original: de'i rnam pa nyid kho na nye ba yin nam /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nyid kho na nye ba yin nam /
translated: Is it only the form of that which is present?

original: dbang po la sogs pa la ni de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa la ni de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not present in the sense faculty, etc.

original: de bzhin du nyams su myong ba lkog tu gyur ba nyid dam /
analyzed: de bzhin du nyams su myong ba lkog tu gyur ba nyid dam /
translated: Likewise, if the experience is hidden or

original: de ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyid yin na /
translated: if it is not of that form,

original: ji ltar don lkog tu ma gyur pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar don lkog tu ma gyur pa yin /
translated: how can the object be non-hidden?

original: de nyid la yang shes pa de nyid yin @81b pa'i phyir ji ltar phyin ci log yin /
analyzed: de nyid la yang shes pa de nyid yin @81b pa'i phyir ji ltar phyin ci log yin /
translated: And how can it be erroneous if it is of that very nature?

original: 'di la smras pa /
analyzed: 'di la smras pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: dbang po 'am bdag nyid kyi yul du byung ba ni blo de'i stobs kyis nyams su myong ba'i ming ni gnas skabs kyi bye brag tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir shes pa ni de'i rnam pa nyid ma yin la mngon sum nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: dbang po 'am bdag nyid kyi yul du byung ba ni blo de'i stobs kyis nyams su myong ba'i ming ni gnas skabs kyi bye brag tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir shes pa ni de'i rnam pa nyid ma yin la mngon sum nyid kyang ngo //
translated: That which appears as an object of the sense faculty or of the self is not of the form of that cognition, because it is called an experience by the power of that cognition and because it arises as a particular state.

original: don shes pa nyid yin na thag ring ba dang nye ba bdag gi rtogs pa po dag la thag ring ba dang nye ba nyid lkog tu gyur pa dang / lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don shes pa nyid yin na thag ring ba dang nye ba bdag gi rtogs pa po dag la thag ring ba dang nye ba nyid lkog tu gyur pa dang / lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object were consciousness itself, then the fact that it is distant or near would not be hidden or non-hidden for the cognizer who is distant or near.

original: de nyid kyis na don dang shes pa dag gis rnam pa'i dbye ba rang nyid las grub pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na don dang shes pa dag gis rnam pa'i dbye ba rang nyid las grub pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the distinction of the form of the object and consciousness is established by itself.

original: yul gyi shes pa bzhin du yul gyi shes pa de nyid shes pa dag gi bye brag tu yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa bzhin du yul gyi shes pa de nyid shes pa dag gi bye brag tu yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the object is different from the cognition of the object, so too the cognition of the object would be different from the cognitions.

original: rtogs pa'i don zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba dran pa'i gnas skabs kyi don nyid yin gyi shes pa'i ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba dran pa'i gnas skabs kyi don nyid yin gyi shes pa'i ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúrealized‚Äù is the meaning of the state of remembering experience, not the meaning of cognition,

original: don dang shes ba dag gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dang shes ba dag gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi phyir ro //
translated: because of the concomitance and nonconcomitance of object and cognition.

original: de yang gzhan dang rjes su mi mthun pa ma yin pa la yang /
analyzed: de yang gzhan dang rjes su mi mthun pa ma yin pa la yang /
translated: And that is not incompatible with another,

original: de'i rjes su mi mthun pa yin na med pa'i phyir grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rjes su mi mthun pa yin na med pa'i phyir grub pa yin no //
translated: because it is established that if it were incompatible with that, it would not exist.

original: des na skyes nas 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir rtsod pa med do /
analyzed: des na skyes nas 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir rtsod pa med do /
translated: Therefore, there is no dispute because it is momentary.

original: skad cig ma yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni skad cig ma nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med par bsams pa yin gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni skad cig ma nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med par bsams pa yin gyi /
translated: The statement ‚Äúmomentariness is not established‚Äù and so on is thinking that there is no valid cognition that establishes momentariness,

original: skad cig ma nyid du khas blangs nas 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bo med par bsams pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid du khas blangs nas 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bo med par bsams pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not thinking that having accepted momentariness, cause and effect are not established.

original: rtag tu yod pa'am med pa'ang rung rgyu med pa zhes bya ba'i rigs pas skye ba'i dus nyid na 'jig pa'am cis ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa'am med pa'ang rung rgyu med pa zhes bya ba'i rigs pas skye ba'i dus nyid na 'jig pa'am cis ma yin te /
translated: If it is always existent or nonexistent, then how could it be destroyed at the time of its arising, since it is called ‚Äúcauseless‚Äù?

original: 'jig pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la ma mthong ba tsam la 'jig par sems pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la ma mthong ba tsam la 'jig par sems pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you think that nonseeing is destruction, but there is no cause of destruction.

original: mthong ba la sogs pa nyid las ma mthong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba la sogs pa nyid las ma mthong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Nonseeing is not due to seeing and so on,

original: dus gzhan na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus gzhan na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists at another time.

original: de'i phyir dmigs pa ni yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs pa ni yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the object exists,üîΩbut nonapprehension is nonexistent.

original: mi dmigs pa ni med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rgyu zhig na 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rgyu zhig na 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the so-called cause of the arising of the effect.

original: rgyu mi dmigs pa yin na 'bras bur 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu mi dmigs pa yin na 'bras bur 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
translated: If the cause is not apprehended, it becomes the effect.üîΩThis is the meaning.üîΩTherefore, the destruction of the cause is different from the cause.

original: des na rgyu'i zhig pa ni rgyu las tha dad pa'i phyir des na de'i dus su 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni rgyu'i dus su yin par 'gyur zhes bya ba yang sel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu'i zhig pa ni rgyu las tha dad pa'i phyir des na de'i dus su 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni rgyu'i dus su yin par 'gyur zhes bya ba yang sel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect that arises at that time is the cause at that time. This is also eliminated.

original: des na skad cig ma nyid la snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rgyu nyid kyi ngo bo'i bag chags bsal bar byed par mi nus so //
analyzed: des na skad cig ma nyid la snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rgyu nyid kyi ngo bo'i bag chags bsal bar byed par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible for the present moment to eliminate the habitual tendencies of the results and causes of the previous and later moments.

original: 'bras bu ni med pa'i bdag nyid thob pa'i don ni rgyu la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni med pa'i bdag nyid thob pa'i don ni rgyu la ltos pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúobtaining a non-existent nature‚Äù is dependent on a cause.

original: de la ltos pa'i dus su rgyu'i @82a * //
analyzed: de la ltos pa'i dus su rgyu'i @82a * //
translated: When it is dependent on that, the existence of the cause

original: yod pa ni rgyu nyid yin gyi 'bras bu'i dus su ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ni rgyu nyid yin gyi 'bras bu'i dus su ni ma yin te /
translated: is the cause itself, but not at the time of the result,

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: because it is not dependent. This is the thought.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag gcig pa nyid du gang smras pa yang /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag gcig pa nyid du gang smras pa yang /
translated: As for what was said about the identity of the apprehended and apprehender,

original: de yang gcig 'dzin pa ni gnyis kyi rnam pa 'dzin pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dag la rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa las gzhan pa yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i rgol ba la //
analyzed: de yang gcig 'dzin pa ni gnyis kyi rnam pa 'dzin pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dag la rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa las gzhan pa yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i rgol ba la //
translated: that is also the case. The apprehension of one is the apprehension of the aspect of two. It is suitable for arising and disintegration to be apprehended as existent and non-existent, and so on, by something other than the apprehender.

original: de'i lan ni /
analyzed: de'i lan ni /
translated: The response to that is as follows.

original: shes pa'i cha tha dad pa dang / snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pa tha dad pas kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin byed nyid kyi nye bar blangs pas /
analyzed: shes pa'i cha tha dad pa dang / snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pa tha dad pas kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin byed nyid kyi nye bar blangs pas /
translated: And because the aspects of consciousness are different, and because the earlier and later consciousnesses are different, the apprehended and the apprehender are not the same.

original: de gsha' mar byed pa'i blo'i rgyu ni gzung bya dang 'dzin byed gcig par 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: de gsha' mar byed pa'i blo'i rgyu ni gzung bya dang 'dzin byed gcig par 'dod pa yin na /
translated: If the cause of the mind that makes them one is the assertion that the apprehended and the apprehender are the same,

original: gcig pa nyid kyi bdag nyid la dpe ni khyed la gang na yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi 'dod pa nye bar brjod nas /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid kyi bdag nyid la dpe ni khyed la gang na yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi 'dod pa nye bar brjod nas /
translated: then you have no example at all of a single nature.

original: de la nus pa can dang / dpe med par nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i theg pa dang rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /üîΩnges bzung med pas nges 'dzin med //
analyzed: de la nus pa can dang / dpe med par nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i theg pa dang rjes su mthun pa ma yin te / nges bzung med pas nges 'dzin med //
translated: Having stated the opponent‚Äôs position, the text says that the demonstration that the example is not established and that the reason is not included in the predicate is not in accord with the YogƒÅcƒÅra.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: The text says, ‚ÄúBecause there is no definite instance, there is no definite apprehension.‚Äù

original: gzung 'dzin gyis stong pa'i shes pa ni de kho na nyid gcig pu yin no zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gyis stong pa'i shes pa ni de kho na nyid gcig pu yin no zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The view of those who say that consciousness empty of apprehended and apprehender is the sole reality is that there is no definite instance of the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: dmigs pa dang bcas par nges la //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas par nges la //
translated: It is certain that it is associated with an objective support.

original: sngo dang de blo tha dad min //üîΩzhes bya ba dang / gzung 'dzin gyi rnam pa tha dad pas stong pa ni de kho na nyid yin te /
analyzed: sngo dang de blo tha dad min // zhes bya ba dang / gzung 'dzin gyi rnam pa tha dad pas stong pa ni de kho na nyid yin te /
translated: The cognition of blue and so on is not different from it.üîΩAnd:üîΩThe reality of the cognition of blue and so on is the emptiness of the difference of apprehendeds and apprehenders, because it is observed without difference.

original: tha mi dad bar nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha mi dad bar nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: stong pa nyid du gang bshad pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid du gang bshad pa ji ltar yin /
translated: How is it explained as emptiness?

original: kho bo cag gis rnam pa'i dbye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa rnam par dbye ba khas blangs pa de ni med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis rnam pa'i dbye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa rnam par dbye ba khas blangs pa de ni med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that since we do not see a difference in aspects, the difference in the nature of apprehendeds and apprehenders that we accept does not exist.

original: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba nyid kho na sa sngon po la sogs pa de las ldog pa yang de'i rnam pa dang bral bar mthong ba'i phyir tha mi dad par sgrub par byed pa ni mngon sum dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyams su myong ba nyid kho na sa sngon po la sogs pa de las ldog pa yang de'i rnam pa dang bral bar mthong ba'i phyir tha mi dad par sgrub par byed pa ni mngon sum dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the experience of blue and so on is seen to be free from the aspect of its negation, the proof that they are not different is in contradiction with direct perception.

original: bsgrub bya dang 'brel par ma mthong na sgrub byed kyi rjes su dpag pa la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir rtags la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa'i mngon sum la rjes su dpag pa ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang 'brel par ma mthong na sgrub byed kyi rjes su dpag pa la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir rtags la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa'i mngon sum la rjes su dpag pa ltos pa yin te /
translated: If one does not see a connection with the probandum, one engages in the inference that is the proof. Therefore, the direct perception that apprehends the reason and so on depends on inference.

original: des na de dang 'gal ba yin gyi mngon sum ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de dang 'gal ba yin gyi mngon sum ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is contradictory to that, but direct perception is not like that.

original: de ni bdag nyid don gyi de ma thag par nges par byed na /
analyzed: de ni bdag nyid don gyi de ma thag par nges par byed na /
translated: If that ascertains the object itself immediately,

original: rang gi yul la rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi yul la rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: it does not establish its own object.

original: gang gis de lam 'grub par the tshom za ba @82b yin na /
analyzed: gang gis de lam 'grub par the tshom za ba @82b yin na /
translated: If one doubts whether it is established by that,

original: rjes su dpag pa la ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la ltos par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would depend on inference.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: so sor snang ba nyid las so //
analyzed: so sor snang ba nyid las so //
translated: It is from the individual appearances themselves.

original: 'di sngon po'i zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba la the tshom za ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di sngon po'i zhes bya ba ni so sor snang ba la the tshom za ba ma yin no //
translated: The statement this is blue does not doubt the individual appearances.

original: de yang ka ba'o zhes bya ba'am rtsig pa'o zhes bya bar shin tu nges pa'i blo ji ltar phyin ci log par 'gyur zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ka ba'o zhes bya ba'am rtsig pa'o zhes bya bar shin tu nges pa'i blo ji ltar phyin ci log par 'gyur zhes smos pa'o //
translated: And how could that be mistaken for the cognition that is very certain, This is a pillar or This is a wall?

original: dang po la ni legs par dpyad pas lan thebs pa yin no //
analyzed: dang po la ni legs par dpyad pas lan thebs pa yin no //
translated: The first is answered by the proper analysis.

original: gang las 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid du snang ba yin la /
analyzed: gang las 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyams su myong bar bya ba nyid du snang ba yin la /
translated: From which there is the appearance of the experience of all migrating beings.üîΩTherefore,

original: des na / bud med cig gi lus la yang //üîΩdka' thub pa dang 'dod ldan khyi'i //
analyzed: des na / bud med cig gi lus la yang // dka' thub pa dang 'dod ldan khyi'i //
translated: In the body of a woman,üîΩThe ascetic, the lustful man,

original: ro dang 'dod bya bza' ba ste //
analyzed: ro dang 'dod bya bza' ba ste //
translated: The corpse, and the food to be eaten,

original: rnam par rtog pa rnam gsum 'byung //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnam gsum 'byung //
translated: The three kinds of conceptualization arise.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa'i dngos po la nges pa'i bag chags kyi dbang gis thams cad don thams cad 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: skar ma rgyu skar chos grangs rnams //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyi bye brag 'dzin pa ni /

analyzed: sgra'i dbye ba'i thabs can dang / dbyibs dang / skye gnas kyis kyang 'grib pa dang 'phel pa dang de gnyi ga'i dngos po'i tshul gyi rtags rnams kyis brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa nyid 'dzin pa yin gyi /
translated: and by the method of the division of sound, and by shape, and by birth, and by the signs of decrease, increase, and both of those things, one should apprehend the certainty just as it is, by the power of the desire to express.

original: thams cad kyis thams cad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyis thams cad ni ma yin no //
translated: But not by all in all cases.

original: des na de ltar nges pa'i ngo bo gzhan 'dzin pa ni gzhan sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa gnod pa med pa don dam pa pa ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na de ltar nges pa'i ngo bo gzhan 'dzin pa ni gzhan sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa gnod pa med pa don dam pa pa ni gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //

original: mi bslu ba can nyid ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: mi bslu ba can nyid ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: But it is not so in the case of the non-deceptive.üîΩThere is no fault in not being worldly, because it is valid knowledge.

original: zhes bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa yin te /

analyzed: sngon po rang gi ngo bo nyid ni rang nyid las rtogs par bya ba yin gyi /

analyzed: de'i gzung ba nyid dam 'dzin pa nyid las ni ma yin no //

original: bden te / mthong ba ni gzhan nyid las go ba ma yin la /
analyzed: bden te / mthong ba ni gzhan nyid las go ba ma yin la /

original: rnam par rtog pa ni sngon po de la sngon po ma yin par rnam par gcod pas sam mi shes pa rnam par gcod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gcig bzung nas tha dad pa'am gzhan du yang snang bar byed pa ni bag chags
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni sngon po de la sngon po ma yin par rnam par gcod pas sam mi shes pa rnam par gcod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gcig bzung nas tha dad pa'am gzhan du yang snang bar byed pa ni bag chags
translated: but conceptual thought, by excluding non-blue in regard to blue or by excluding non-knowledge, grasps one of the two, concomitance and non-concomitance, and by the power of latent impressions, it makes blue appear as different or other.

original: kyi stobs yin par brjod de /
analyzed: kyi stobs yin par brjod de /

analyzed: tha dad par yang 'dzin par byed pa yin no // de ni don yang dag @83a * //

original: par rig par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: par rig par byed pa yin la /

original: bdag nyid dang sre bar byed pa ni bdag nyid don du so sor snang ba'i stobs kyis don bzhin du bdag nyid kyang de'i bya ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas /üîΩbdag gis 'di rig go zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //

original: nyams su myong ba'i myong ba ni don nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i myong ba ni don nyams su myong ba yin no //

analyzed: nyams su myong ba la mi ltos pa yin na thug pa med pa'i phyir don nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa yang dag par rig pa ni nga rgyal gyi yul yin la /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa yang dag par rig pa ni nga rgyal gyi yul yin la /

original: de yang skad cig ma re re la gzhan dang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: de yang skad cig ma re re la gzhan dang gzhan yin te /

analyzed: rgyu nye bar dmigs bzhin pa la 'khrul pas 'di nyid ni phyi rol lo //

original: 'di nyid ni phyi rol lo zhes nye bar rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni phyi rol lo zhes nye bar rtogs pa yin gyi /

analyzed: des phyi rol gyi phyogs su 'jog pa yin yang phyi rol bar so sor snang ba ni ma yin te /

original: mthong ba la de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mthong ba la de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because it does not appear in that way to the visual consciousness.

original: / sngon por mthong ba ni phyi rol rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: / sngon por mthong ba ni phyi rol rig pa ma yin te /

original: tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //

original: sngon po nyid ni shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po nyid ni shes pa ma yin te /

original: de med na yang ser po la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na yang ser po la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de dag tha dad pa yin na de las ldog pa ma yin pa'i shes pa khyad par can yang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag tha dad pa yin na de las ldog pa ma yin pa'i shes pa khyad par can yang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: because if they are different, the special consciousness that is not the opposite of that would also be different.

original: khyad par can yang sngar ni de dang bral ba yin la /
analyzed: khyad par can yang sngar ni de dang bral ba yin la /

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i stobs kyis 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i stobs kyis 'gyur ba yin no //

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: gnas skabs de ni gang nas kyang rnyed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs de ni gang nas kyang rnyed pa ma yin te /
translated: because that state is not obtained from anywhere.

original: khyad par can gyi phyi rol yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi phyi rol yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is the external object that is special.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

analyzed: gcig la gcig brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir te 'dir phyi rol yin pa'i phyir khyad par can nyid du grub pa yin la /

original: grub pa de yang 'di'i phyi rol nyid yin no //
analyzed: grub pa de yang 'di'i phyi rol nyid yin no //
translated: And that establishment is the external object itself.

analyzed: dbang po dang yul las gzhan pa yod par gyur kyang gang med na so sor snang ba mi 'byung ba yin la /
translated: Even if something other than the sense faculty and object exists, if it does not exist, the appearance of each would not occur.

original: de ni 'di'i yin gyi shes pa'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di'i yin gyi shes pa'i ni ma yin te /

analyzed: de ma yin pas drangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /

original: mi rigs te /
analyzed: mi rigs te /

analyzed: de ma thag pa'i shes pa las gzhan pa de las gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa'i de ma thag pa'i ser po'i shes pa ji ltar yin / ma yin te /

analyzed: de la yang ser po'i shes pa nyid de ma thag pa yin pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig po de ni nye ba ma yin te /

original: 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa yin no //
translated: That alone is not proximate, it is past.

original: de yang mtshungs pa ni yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de yang mtshungs pa ni yod pa ma yin la /

analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rgyu nyid bag chags yin la /

analyzed: skad cig ma nyid yin par yang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dran pa ni 'das pa'i nyams su myong ba las 'byung ba ste bag chags las 'byung ba zhes brjod do //

analyzed: sad pa po med na ji ltar bag chags las byung ba yin khyed la yang mtshungs so //

analyzed: kho bo ni yul dang dus la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'dod do zhe na /

analyzed: khyed kyi yang ci las yin /

original: rang gi rgyu las so //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las so //

analyzed: kho bo'i rang gi bag chags yin no //

analyzed: smon lam la sogs pa 'jig rten pa nyid kyis sad pa'i rgyu ni rnyed par dka' ba yin no //

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /

analyzed: gal te mtshungs pa de ma thag / rkyen las nges par mi smra na'o //

analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: mthong ba ni gzung bya nyid kyi sa rnam par rtog pa las de'i yul la sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa las bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur gyi /

original: rtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa las ni ma yin te /

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la gzhan du mthong ba ni gnas pa can yin no //
analyzed: de la gzhan du mthong ba ni gnas pa can yin no //

original: gzung bya 'dzin pa zhes bya ba 'di la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: gzung bya 'dzin pa zhes bya ba 'di la yang mtshungs so //

analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i bsgrub bya ma yin no //

analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa gzhan las yin te thog ma med do //

analyzed: mthong ba ni rang gi bag chags las 'byung ba ma yin la /

analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa yang ngo zhes stobs mtshungs pa'i phyir gang gis gang la gnod pa yin /

analyzed: gnyi ga dag gis gnyi ga 'grub pa yin na / gnyis med pa nyid dam cig shos su 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dngul gyi rnam par rtog pa bzhin du mthong ba'i yul la rtogs par byed pa yin la /

analyzed: ngo bo ni rnam par rtog pa nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

analyzed: mthong ba'i yul yang de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: bya ba las yin no zhe na /

analyzed: gcig dngos gcig gi rnam pa zhes //

translated: is not taught by ƒ™≈õvara.

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
