original: ma yin te /üîΩtshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te / tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gnyi ga shes pa yin no zhe na /

analyzed: mthong bas rang gi yul la rnam par 'jog par byed na bzlog pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir dang / ma gsal ba yin na rnam par 'jog pa med pa yin no //
translated: If it is established by seeing, then it is the opposite of the object of exclusion, and if it is not clear, then it is not established.

analyzed: mthong bas ngo bo gzhan ma mthong ba nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul yin gyi ;

analyzed: de nyid ni ngo bo gzhan la rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ma yin te /

analyzed: rnam par brtag bya'i bzlog pa ni mthong ba las gzhan pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mthong ba'i bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa can ni sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa las yin pa bzhin du /

original: de ma yin pa yongs su spangs nas 'jug pa ni 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ma yin pa yongs su spangs nas 'jug pa ni 'gal ba ma yin no //

analyzed: de nyid ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pas phyi rol nyid du sgro btags pa na mthong ba na med do zhes zer ba ni /

analyzed: bye brag tu rab tu ma grub pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dmigs par bya ba ma yin no //

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /

analyzed: phyi ma dang 'brel pa can nyid snga ma'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir de rig pa nyid kyis rig pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: de'i tshe 'di'i nges pa 'ba' zhig ni med pa'i phyir shes pa phyi mas nges par byed ba yin gyi 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //

analyzed: de phyir dngos po mthong ba yis //

analyzed: yon tan mtha' dag mthong ba nyid //

original: ces 'chad par 'gyur ba'o ;
analyzed: ces 'chad par 'gyur ba'o ;

analyzed: / des na 'di ltar goms pa yod na rtogs par nges pa ni /
translated: Thus, if there is familiarity, there is certainty of realization.

original: rang nyid kho na las yin pa'i phyir de la nges pa'i don du yang gzhan la ltos pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rang nyid kho na las yin pa'i phyir de la nges pa'i don du yang gzhan la ltos pa ma yin la /
translated: Because it is produced from itself alone, it is not in fact dependent on another.

original: gang du gzung ba la yang phyin ci log tu nges pas bsgribs pa ni nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa bzhin dang / mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i shes pa bzhin du de las gzhan pa nyid tshad ma yin gyi snga ma ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du gzung ba la yang phyin ci log tu nges pas bsgribs pa ni nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa bzhin dang / mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i shes pa bzhin du de las gzhan pa nyid tshad ma yin gyi snga ma ni ma yin te /
translated: And because it is obscured by the ascertainment of an object that is the opposite of the way it is, like the consciousness of silver in a shell, or the consciousness of permanence in impermanence, that which is other than that is valid cognition, but not the former,

original: bya ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its function is not complete.üîΩThis is also explained in the following:

original: 'di yang / gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las //
analyzed: 'di yang / gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las //
translated: Seeing the similarity of form,

original: nya phyis la dngul rnam pa ltar /
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul rnam pa ltar /
translated: like the consciousness of silver in a shell,

original: gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
translated: if, due to the cause of error,

original: yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na //
analyzed: yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na //
translated: it does not connect with another property,

original: 'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas //
analyzed: 'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas //
translated: because of error it does not ascertain,

original: sgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: sgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin //
translated: and the proof does not engage.

original: zhes kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i the tshom ni tshad ma'i bya ba la gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes kyang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i the tshom ni tshad ma'i bya ba la gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Also, doubt, which will be explained, does not harm the function of valid knowledge.

original: de lta yin na du ba dang ldan pa las me dang ldan pa nyid la mer mi rig pa ni rang nyid las shes pa yin par 'gyur ro //üîΩ'on te me la ltos nas @86a * //
analyzed: de lta yin na du ba dang ldan pa las me dang ldan pa nyid la mer mi rig pa ni rang nyid las shes pa yin par 'gyur ro // 'on te me la ltos nas @86a * //
translated: If that were so, then the cognition of fire from the possession of smoke would be self-cognition.

original: de dang ldan pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa nyid yin la /
translated: But if it is the possession of fire in dependence on fire,

original: de mi 'dzin par byed yin te /
analyzed: de mi 'dzin par byed yin te /
translated: then it is not the apprehension of that.

original: gzhan la ltos pa'i rig pa ni phyin ci log tu sgro btags pas bar du bsgribs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa'i rig pa ni phyin ci log tu sgro btags pas bar du bsgribs pa yin no //
translated: The cognition that depends on another is obscured by superimposition.

original: de lta yin na phyin ci log tu sgro btags pas bar du chod pas de dang ldan pa nyid rig pa ji ltar ma bsgribs pa zhes bya ba yin /
analyzed: de lta yin na phyin ci log tu sgro btags pas bar du chod pas de dang ldan pa nyid rig pa ji ltar ma bsgribs pa zhes bya ba yin /
translated: If that were so, then how could the cognition of the possession of that be unobscured, since it is obstructed by superimposition?

original: thag ring ba la ni shin tu 'dzin pa yin yang de'i bye brag shing dha ba dang shing pa la sha yin zhes bya ba la ni /
analyzed: thag ring ba la ni shin tu 'dzin pa yin yang de'i bye brag shing dha ba dang shing pa la sha yin zhes bya ba la ni /
translated: Even though one clearly apprehends something at a distance, one is unsure about its specific properties, such as whether it is a dhava or palasha tree.

original: the tshom gyis non pas gzhan la ltos pa nyid kyi the tshom tsam mam /
analyzed: the tshom gyis non pas gzhan la ltos pa nyid kyi the tshom tsam mam /
translated: One is overwhelmed by doubt, and so one is unsure about the other properties.

original: de las gzhan gyis spong bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan gyis spong bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: One does not eliminate that doubt.

original: shing dha ba la sogs par sngar ma rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing dha ba la sogs par sngar ma rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because previously, in the sandalwood, etc., it was not known.

original: de nyid shing dha ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid shing dha ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is the same as the sandalwood, etc.,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: it is not so,

original: de nyid du zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid du zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no attachment to it.

original: phyis zhen pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyis zhen pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is the attachment later,

original: gang mthong ba las de bzhin du zhen pa yin la /
analyzed: gang mthong ba las de bzhin du zhen pa yin la /
translated: it is the attachment to it as it is seen.

original: de ni bye brag gzhan yin te /
analyzed: de ni bye brag gzhan yin te /
translated: But that is a different particular,

original: mthong ba nyid mthong ba las lag pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid mthong ba las lag pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: because the seeing itself is seen, like the hand, etc.

original: mthong ba nyid du rig pa ni lag pa la sogs pa rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid du rig pa ni lag pa la sogs pa rig pa ma yin te /
translated: The knowledge of the seeing itself is not the knowledge of the hand, etc.,

original: the tshom med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no doubt.

original: gcig nyid la ni de bzhin du 'gyur la /
analyzed: gcig nyid la ni de bzhin du 'gyur la /
translated: It would be so in the case of the same thing,

original: 'di ni nya phyis kyi shes pa bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni nya phyis kyi shes pa bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: but this would be like the knowledge of the oyster shell.

original: nya phyis la yang dngul las bye brag yin la /
analyzed: nya phyis la yang dngul las bye brag yin la /
translated: In the oyster shell, silver is a particular,

original: dngul la'am de las bye brag tu bzung ba yin na /
analyzed: dngul la'am de las bye brag tu bzung ba yin na /
translated: but if silver or the particular of that is apprehended,

original: gnod pa can gyi shes pa bzhin du sgro btags pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi shes pa bzhin du sgro btags pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then, like the knowledge of the invalid, it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no superimposition.

original: de'i phyir gang las phyis 'byung ba ni bye brag 'dzin pa la nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang las phyis 'byung ba ni bye brag 'dzin pa la nges pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of the particular is subsequent to the apprehension of the universal.

original: de la sngar ni de 'dzin pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: de la sngar ni de 'dzin pa med pa yin te /
translated: But the particular is not apprehended prior to the universal,

original: drug ldan la sogs pa 'dzin pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: drug ldan la sogs pa 'dzin pa lta bu ste /
translated: just as the apprehension of the possessor of the particular, such as the possessor of the quality of being made of parts, etc.,

original: ma goms pa na rdul ldan la sogs pa'i bye brag rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma goms pa na rdul ldan la sogs pa'i bye brag rig pa ma yin no //
translated: is not known when one is not familiar with the particular, such as the quality of being made of parts, etc.

original: de'i tshe rig pa ma yin na dbang po'i bya ba yod kyang phyis ji ltar rig par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rig pa ma yin na dbang po'i bya ba yod kyang phyis ji ltar rig par byed pa yin te /
translated: If the particular is not known at that time, then how can it be known later, even if the activity of the sense faculty exists,

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference?

original: dbang po'i bya ba bye brag tu mi 'gyur du zin kyang yid ni goms pa yin na /
analyzed: dbang po'i bya ba bye brag tu mi 'gyur du zin kyang yid ni goms pa yin na /
translated: Even if the activity of the sense faculty does not differ, if the mind is familiar,

original: bye brag chan por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bye brag chan por 'gyur ro //
translated: there will be a great difference.

original: dbang po las skyes ba ni mngon du byed pa yin na /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes ba ni mngon du byed pa yin na /
translated: If it is produced from the sense faculty, it is manifest.

original: ji ltar yid kyis byed pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar yid kyis byed pa yin /
translated: How can it be produced by the mind?

original: mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not abandoned because it is seen.

original: dbang po med kyang 'byung ba ni gzhan gyi tshe yang yin na nges bskyed par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang po med kyang 'byung ba ni gzhan gyi tshe yang yin na nges bskyed par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Even without a sense faculty, the element is produced at another time. How can it be produced with certainty?

original: bden te / 'di'i tshe yang yid nyid dngos kyi rgyu yin la /
analyzed: bden te / 'di'i tshe yang yid nyid dngos kyi rgyu yin la /
translated: True, but at this time, the mind itself is the direct cause,

original: dbang po ni rjes su @86b 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po ni rjes su @86b 'jug pa yin no //
translated: and the sense faculty is the secondary cause.

original: de ni des chog go //üîΩde skad du yang /
analyzed: de ni des chog go // de skad du yang /
translated: That is sufficient.

original: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las /
analyzed: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las /
translated: And it is said in the Ascertainment of Valid Cognition:

original: de ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa ni rjes su dpag pa nyid 'dor ba ma yin te zhes smos pa la /
analyzed: de ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa ni rjes su dpag pa nyid 'dor ba ma yin te zhes smos pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThus, it is not that the establishment is abandoned in inference itself.

original: mi slu ba la sogs pa'i khyad par yod pa'i sgo nas thob par bya ba la tshad ma nyid ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: mi slu ba la sogs pa'i khyad par yod pa'i sgo nas thob par bya ba la tshad ma nyid ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It is obtained through the distinction of non-deception and so forth, and the validity is to be inferred,

original: mngon sum du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum du ni ma yin te /
translated: but not directly perceived,

original: gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it depends on another.

original: gong du yang mi slu ba dang / slu ba la sogs pas dmigs pa ni gzhan gyi dbang yin par bstan pa de la yang skyon yod par bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gong du yang mi slu ba dang / slu ba la sogs pas dmigs pa ni gzhan gyi dbang yin par bstan pa de la yang skyon yod par bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And above, it is shown that there is a fault in the teaching that the object of non-deception, deception, and so forth is dependent, meaning that there is a fault in that teaching.

original: de lta yin na bye brag de sngar shin tu ma bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na bye brag de sngar shin tu ma bzung ba yin no //
translated: If that is so, that distinction was not well grasped before.

original: de lta ni ci zhig bzung ba yin /
analyzed: de lta ni ci zhig bzung ba yin /
translated: What was grasped like that?

original: spyi yin no //
analyzed: spyi yin no //
translated: The universal.

original: ci da ltar gyi khas len pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci da ltar gyi khas len pa yin nam /
translated: Is it the present one that is accepted?

original: bden te / de nyid shes pa'i so sor snang ba khyad par du ba'i thun mong ba'i spyi yin te /
analyzed: bden te / de nyid shes pa'i so sor snang ba khyad par du ba'i thun mong ba'i spyi yin te /
translated: It is true that it is the particular appearance of the cognition of that which is the common universal.

original: thag ring por yal ga la sogs pa can du snang ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: thag ring por yal ga la sogs pa can du snang ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the appearance of a tree, etc. at a distance.üîΩAnd it is said:

original: de yang / rtags ni spyi yi yul can du //
analyzed: de yang / rtags ni spyi yi yul can du //
translated: The reason is that the object of the universal

original: sngar bstan tha dad min gnas phyir //
analyzed: sngar bstan tha dad min gnas phyir //
translated: is taught previously as non-different.

original: zhes bya ba dang / gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las zhes kyang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las zhes kyang gsungs pa'o //
translated: And it is said: ‚ÄúFrom seeing the similar property.‚Äù

original: gang du rig par byed pa ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du rig par byed pa ni gzhan la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is cognized does not depend on another,

original: skad cig ma nyid kyi shes pa tsam la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid kyi shes pa tsam la sogs pa la'o //
translated: because it is the mere cognition of momentariness, etc.

original: de la ni mngon sum nyid las tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de la ni mngon sum nyid las tshad ma yin la /
translated: And it is valid cognition because it is direct perception.

original: thog ma med pa la sogs pa'i dus kyi ma rig pa'i sa bon gyi rjes su 'brangs nas tha snyad 'dogs pa po yul mthong nas yul can la 'jug par byed pa ni skyed byed nyid du rjod par byed pa nyid la 'jug pa lta bu yin pa'i
analyzed: thog ma med pa la sogs pa'i dus kyi ma rig pa'i sa bon gyi rjes su 'brangs nas tha snyad 'dogs pa po yul mthong nas yul can la 'jug par byed pa ni skyed byed nyid du rjod par byed pa nyid la 'jug pa lta bu yin pa'i
translated: The person who imputes the convention in dependence on the seed of ignorance in beginningless time is said to be the producer of the object, just as one engages in the activity of entering into the object by seeing the object.

original: phyir snga na med pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir snga na med pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not establish that the person exists prior to the object.

original: 'di la yang tshad ma rnam par nges pa las /
analyzed: 'di la yang tshad ma rnam par nges pa las /
translated: Also, in Ascertainment of Valid Knowledge, it says:

original: gzhan nyams su myong ba'i yul rnams las zhes smos pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan nyams su myong ba'i yul rnams las zhes smos pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the objects experienced by others.‚Äù

original: yul rig par byed pa la gzhan la ltos pa med pa rnams las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul rig par byed pa la gzhan la ltos pa med pa rnams las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is from those that are not dependent on others in the process of knowing the object.

original: yul yang rang gi ngo bo nyid yin no //üîΩde nyid ni /
analyzed: yul yang rang gi ngo bo nyid yin no // de nyid ni /
translated: The object is also its own nature.üîΩThat itself is the meaning of ‚Äúthe single nature of the object‚Äù and so on.

original: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa yang don 'di nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i rang dbang du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa yang don 'di nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i rang dbang du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It should be understood that it is not independent.

original: 'dir 'di'i don yin zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: 'dir 'di'i don yin zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit is the meaning of this‚Äù is

original: gcig ste gzhan la mi ltos pa'i don gyi rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bo'i khongs su gtogs pa ni mngon sum ste /üîΩrab tu gsal ba'i ngo bo la skad cig ma nyid la @87a * //
analyzed: gcig ste gzhan la mi ltos pa'i don gyi rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bo'i khongs su gtogs pa ni mngon sum ste / rab tu gsal ba'i ngo bo la skad cig ma nyid la @87a * //
translated: The object that is included in the nature of the thing itself, which is to say, the object that is not dependent on anything else, is directly perceived.

original: sogs par rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: sogs par rtogs pa yin na /
translated: If the nature of the thing itself is clearly manifest, then the cognition of momentariness, etc.,üîΩis directly perceived.

original: gzhan te / ngo bo gzhan ma rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin pa ni gang shes par byed pa'i mtshan ma gzhan btsal dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan te / ngo bo gzhan ma rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin pa ni gang shes par byed pa'i mtshan ma gzhan btsal dgos pa'o //
translated: There is no reason for the cognition of something else, which is to say, a thing that has a different nature.

original: de lta yin na su zhig tshad ma gzhan tshol bar byed pa yin pa ldog pa'i sgo nas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta yin na su zhig tshad ma gzhan tshol bar byed pa yin pa ldog pa'i sgo nas bstan pa ni /
translated: If this were the case, then who would seek out another means of knowing?

original: mi byed na zhes bya ba la 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi te /üîΩme la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ri la sogs pa mthong ba las sam /üîΩthag ring bar shing dha ba la sogs pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i shing tsam du mthong bas sam /
analyzed: mi byed na zhes bya ba la 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi te / me la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ri la sogs pa mthong ba las sam / thag ring bar shing dha ba la sogs pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i shing tsam du mthong bas sam /
translated: The negation is stated in the words, ‚Äúif one does not act.‚ÄùüîΩThe reason for the error is that one sees a mountain, etc., that is free of fire, etc.,üîΩor one sees a mere tree, which is free of the particular features of a dhava tree, etc., that are located far away,

original: phyi ma dang 'brel pa dang bral ba'i snga ma mthong bas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: phyi ma dang 'brel pa dang bral ba'i snga ma mthong bas kyang rung ste /
translated: or one sees a tree that is free of the connection with a subsequent tree.

original: de las gzhan pas mi gnod pas phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa yin na khyad par du 'dod pa bsgrub ba'i don du tshad ma gzhan tshol bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las gzhan pas mi gnod pas phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa yin na khyad par du 'dod pa bsgrub ba'i don du tshad ma gzhan tshol bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since it is not harmed by anything else, it is a superimposition of error. The meaning is that one seeks another valid cognition in order to establish a particular object.

original: gang du yang gzhan la mi ltos pa der yang thog ma med pa'i phyin ci log gi bag chags las byung ba'i mngon par 'dod pas bslus pa yin pas tha dad du mi byed pa tha snyad la 'jug par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang du yang gzhan la mi ltos pa der yang thog ma med pa'i phyin ci log gi bag chags las byung ba'i mngon par 'dod pas bslus pa yin pas tha dad du mi byed pa tha snyad la 'jug par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even where it does not depend on another, it is deceived by the desire that arises from beginningless predispositions of error. Therefore, it is taught that one does not make distinctions, but engages in conventions:

original: de phyir dngos po mthong ba yis //
analyzed: de phyir dngos po mthong ba yis //
translated: Therefore, by seeing a thing,

original: yon tan tha dad mthong ba nyid //
analyzed: yon tan tha dad mthong ba nyid //
translated: one sees the difference of its qualities.

original: 'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas //
analyzed: 'khrul pas nges par mi byed pas //
translated: Since error does not ascertain,

original: bsgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin // zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: one engages in proof.

original: de'i phyir phyi ma dang 'brel ba can nyid ni snga ma'i rang gi ngo bo ma yin zhing rang las ni mi rigs pas rig par byed pa la ltos pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi ma dang 'brel ba can nyid ni snga ma'i rang gi ngo bo ma yin zhing rang las ni mi rigs pas rig par byed pa la ltos pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is related to the latter is not the essence of the former. Since it is illogical for it to arise from itself, it depends on an awareness.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba nus par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba nus par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
translated: Therefore, the distinction between valid cognition and the other is possible because it does not exist.

original: 'o na ji ltar tshad ma nyid ces bya ba la smras pa la /üîΩlan du / tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar tshad ma nyid ces bya ba la smras pa la / lan du / tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
translated: If you think this, then how is there valid cognition?

original: ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos te /
translated: In response, he says:üîΩValid cognition is from convention.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad ni 'khor ba bzhin du yod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad ni 'khor ba bzhin du yod pa yin la /
translated: The convention of the world exists like cyclic existence.

original: tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba yang yod pa'i phyir de ni de las 'grub par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba yang yod pa'i phyir de ni de las 'grub par brjod pa yin no //
translated: And because the distinction between valid cognition and the other exists, it is said to be established from that.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa ni tha snyad kyi gzhi ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa ni tha snyad kyi gzhi ma yin te /
translated: Direct perception and so on are not the basis of convention.

original: des grub pa ni tshad mas rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir bag chags nyid ni gzhi yin no //
analyzed: des grub pa ni tshad mas rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir bag chags nyid ni gzhi yin no //
translated: That which is established by it is not known by valid cognition, so the mere latent imprint is the basis.üîΩAnd that is also established by the latent imprints of conceptuality.

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyis gzhag pa yin zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyis gzhag pa yin zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has already been explained.

original: bag chags las byung ba yin yang nyams su myong ba nyid ni snga ma nyid dam /
analyzed: bag chags las byung ba yin yang nyams su myong ba nyid ni snga ma nyid dam /

original: phyi ma nyid kyis au le kha ti sre bar byed ba'am /

original: @87b 'byed par byed pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: @87b 'byed par byed pa yang rung ste /

original: bag chags dang nyams su myong ba dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags dang nyams su myong ba dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //

original: nyams su myong ba dang 'brel par ci las yin zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang 'brel par ci las yin zhes bshad zin to //

original: brdzun pa 'dzin pa'i nus pa las so //

original: rang gi ngo bo ma 'dres pa //

original: ces bstan pa yin no //
