analyzed: dngul gyi shes pa ni nya phyis la mi slu ba can ma yin la / nor bu'i 'od la nor bu'i shes @89a * //
translated: The cognition of silver is not nondeceptive in relation to mother-of-pearl.

original: pa ni don byed pa la mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa ni don byed pa la mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of a jewel in relation to the light of a jewel is a valid cognition because it is nondeceptive in relation to the performance of a function.

original: 'on te don ni sreg pa la sogs pa yin la byed pa ni bya ba byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te don ni sreg pa la sogs pa yin la byed pa ni bya ba byed pa yin no //
translated: But if the object is the burning and so on, and the performance is the performance of the action,

original: byed pa po nyid ni me'i ngo bo yin la /
analyzed: byed pa po nyid ni me'i ngo bo yin la /
translated: then the agent is the nature of fire,

original: de la yang mngon sum la sogs pa mi slu ba can nyid yin te thal ches pa ni ma yin no //üîΩlan ni / 'bras la the tshom yod ces te //
analyzed: de la yang mngon sum la sogs pa mi slu ba can nyid yin te thal ches pa ni ma yin no // lan ni / 'bras la the tshom yod ces te //
translated: and in that case, direct perception and so on are nondeceptive in relation to that, and it is not the case that there is an overextension of the definition.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is stated in the line ‚ÄúThere is doubt about the result.‚Äù

original: 'dod pas thabs nyid shes pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pas thabs nyid shes pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag yin te /
translated: The knowledge of the method through desire is a limb of engagement.

original: thabs las byung ba las the tshom za ba yin yang thabs nyid la ma nges pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: thabs las byung ba las the tshom za ba yin yang thabs nyid la ma nges pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Even though there is doubt about the result that arises from the means, it is not that there is no certainty about the means itself.

original: mthong ba gnyis la sogs pa'i de'i ngo bo nyid la nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba gnyis la sogs pa'i de'i ngo bo nyid la nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is certainty about the nature of the two perceptions, etc.

original: the tshom la ni tshad ma nyid du khas mi len pa yin no //
analyzed: the tshom la ni tshad ma nyid du khas mi len pa yin no //
translated: But doubt is not accepted as valid knowledge.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here someone might say:

original: skyes bu 'jug dang ldog byed kun //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: skyes bu 'jug dang ldog byed kun // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: All the engagement and withdrawal of a person

original: thabs nyid la nges pa las tshad ma nyid yin na ni rig byed las byung ba la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs nyid la nges pa las tshad ma nyid yin na ni rig byed las byung ba la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If valid knowledge is due to certainty about the means itself, then it would also apply to what arises from the Vedas.

original: mngon sum la snang ba nyid kyis tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum la snang ba nyid kyis tshad ma yin la /
translated: In direct perception, there is valid knowledge by mere appearance.

original: rjes su dpag pa can mthong ba las sgrub byed du nges pa las so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa can mthong ba las sgrub byed du nges pa las so //
translated: In inference, it is from certainty about the probandum from what is seen.

original: rig byed las byung ba ni dngos su mthong ba las ma yin la /
analyzed: rig byed las byung ba ni dngos su mthong ba las ma yin la /
translated: What arises from the Vedas is not from direct seeing.

original: nges pa can mthong ba las nges pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa can mthong ba las nges pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And it is not from certainty about what is seen.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: me'i phung po la sogs pa mtho ris kyi thabs nyid du nges pa'i phyir de'i nges pa yang kha cig tu mthong ba las nges pa mthong ba yin pa'am /
analyzed: me'i phung po la sogs pa mtho ris kyi thabs nyid du nges pa'i phyir de'i nges pa yang kha cig tu mthong ba las nges pa mthong ba yin pa'am /
translated: As for the ascertainment of the method, it is seen in some places, and the ascertainment is seen in other places.

original: kha cig tu rgyu skyon can ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu'i skyon med pa ni rig byed skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig tu rgyu skyon can ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu'i skyon med pa ni rig byed skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: As for the absence of a faulty cause, it is not a faulty cause because the Veda is not produced by a person.

original: nges pa can mthong ba kho na las nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa can mthong ba kho na las nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Ascertainment is not only from seeing ascertainment,

original: gzhan du yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen elsewhere.

original: mthong ba yang tshad ma yin pa ni thabs las byung ba la the tshom yin yang de ni don gyis thabs nyid rig pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba yang tshad ma yin pa ni thabs las byung ba la the tshom yin yang de ni don gyis thabs nyid rig pa yin no //
translated: And seeing is valid knowledge, but there is doubt about what arises from a method.

original: ji ltar nges par byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar nges par byed ce na /
translated: How does one ascertain?

original: de ni cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
translated: That is the same for the other.

original: de la thabs las byung ba kha cig tu mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: de la thabs las byung ba kha cig tu mthong ba yin la /
translated: In that case, what arises from a method is seen in some places,

original: gzhan du ni de dang 'dra ba mthong ba las nges par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du ni de dang 'dra ba mthong ba las nges par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and from seeing something similar in other places, one ascertains.

original: de lta yin la thabs las byung ba nges pa nyid las tshad ma nyid du gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta yin la thabs las byung ba nges pa nyid las tshad ma nyid du gyur pa yin la /
translated: Thus, it is a valid means of knowledge that arises from the method.

original: rig byed las ni thabs las byung ba ma mthong ba las na thams cad ji ltar nges par byed pa yin /
analyzed: rig byed las ni thabs las byung ba ma mthong ba las na thams cad ji ltar nges par byed pa yin /
translated: But since the method is not seen in the Vedas, how can they be ascertained?

original: 'on te gnyi ga yang rig byed nyid las nges pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te gnyi ga yang rig byed nyid las nges pa yin la /
translated: Or, if both are ascertained from the Vedas,

original: rgyu'i skyon med pas rjes su dpag pa bzhin du tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i skyon med pas rjes su dpag pa bzhin du tshad ma yin no //
translated: then they are valid means of knowledge like inference, because they are free from the fault of the cause.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, they are not.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni @89b mthong ba dang chos mthun pa nyid kyis tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni @89b mthong ba dang chos mthun pa nyid kyis tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because inference is a valid means of knowledge by the similarity of what is seen.

original: rig byed la ni mthong ba dper bya ba gang na yang med do //
analyzed: rig byed la ni mthong ba dper bya ba gang na yang med do //
translated: But in the Vedas, there is no example of what is seen.

original: sngar mthong ba kho na mthong ba nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba kho na mthong ba nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that only what is seen before is seen,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: no, it is not.

original: rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its own nature is not seen.

original: mngon sum la yang don byed pa'i ngo bo mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum la yang don byed pa'i ngo bo mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: In direct perception also, the nature of the object's function is not seen.

original: de dang 'brel pa nges par byed pa yin no zhes sngar bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa nges par byed pa yin no zhes sngar bstan pa yin te /
translated: It is said that it ascertains the connection with that.

original: 'brel pa ni don byed pa'i ngo bo nye ba yin la /
analyzed: 'brel pa ni don byed pa'i ngo bo nye ba yin la /
translated: The relation is the proximity of the nature of the object.

original: de nyid kyis na tha snyad grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na tha snyad grub pa yin no //
translated: And by that, the conventional is established.

original: de lta yin na rig byed la yang de'i ngo bor tha snyad las grub pa'i phyir mi mthun pa med do //
analyzed: de lta yin na rig byed la yang de'i ngo bor tha snyad las grub pa'i phyir mi mthun pa med do //
translated: If that is so, then there is no contradiction, because the Veda is established by convention as having that nature.

original: rgyu'i skyon med par ji ltar nges pa yin /
analyzed: rgyu'i skyon med par ji ltar nges pa yin /
translated: How is it ascertained that the cause is faultless?

original: skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa nyid kyis de'i skyon 'pho ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa nyid kyis de'i skyon 'pho ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not produced by a person, it is impossible for its fault to be transferred.

original: rab rib can gyi shes pa la yang skyon 'pho ba med pa'i phyir tshad mar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: rab rib can gyi shes pa la yang skyon 'pho ba med pa'i phyir tshad mar 'gyur ro /
translated: And because the fault is not transferred to the cognition of one who has myodesopsia, it is valid knowledge.

original: sgra la ni rig pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: sgra la ni rig pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the knowledge regarding sound.

original: 'di ltar skyes bu'i skyon yod pa dang med pa dag gis tshad ma dang cig shos nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar skyes bu'i skyon yod pa dang med pa dag gis tshad ma dang cig shos nyid yin la /
translated: In this way, the presence and absence of the faults of a person are valid knowledge and otherwise.

original: bdag nyid la ni gzhan du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bdag nyid la ni gzhan du yin no zhe na /
translated: But in itself, it is otherwise.

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: skyes bus byas pa la ni de'i skyon med pa dang yod pa dag gis tshad ma dang / cig shos dag rigs pa yin na /
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa la ni de'i skyon med pa dang yod pa dag gis tshad ma dang / cig shos dag rigs pa yin na /
translated: If that produced by a person is valid knowledge and otherwise by the presence and absence of its faults,

original: skyes bus ma byas pa'i rig byed las byung ba'i mngon sum la sogs pa la ni rang la skyon med pa dang yod pa dag kho nas tshad ma dang cig shos nyid yin pa'i phyir skyes bus ma byas pa nyid la yang rang la yod pa'i skyon medüîΩpar ma nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa'i rig byed las byung ba'i mngon sum la sogs pa la ni rang la skyon med pa dang yod pa dag kho nas tshad ma dang cig shos nyid yin pa'i phyir skyes bus ma byas pa nyid la yang rang la yod pa'i skyon med par ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: But in the case of perception that arises from the Vedas, which are not composed by a person, it is valid cognition because it is free from faults that belong to it, and the other is not, so even if it is not composed by a person, it is not uncertain that it is free from faults that belong to it.

original: sgra las byung ba nyid kyis mtshungs pa yin yang skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa las ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba nyid kyis mtshungs pa yin yang skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa las ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Even though it is similar in being derived from sound, it is not from what is not composed by a person.

original: shes pa nyid kyis yin par ni mtshungs pa yin la /
analyzed: shes pa nyid kyis yin par ni mtshungs pa yin la /
translated: It is similar in being knowledge,

original: rab rib can las shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rab rib can las shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but it is not knowledge from one with diseased vision.

original: rig byed kyis rigs pa rab rib can la yang yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig byed kyis rigs pa rab rib can la yang yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Knowledge from the Vedas would also be from one with diseased vision.

original: thabs kyi nges pa can nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ni rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nges par rtogs pa la yang 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thabs kyi nges pa can nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ni rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nges par rtogs pa la yang 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not a limb of engagement due to being restricted to a method is not engaged in ascertaining through the definition of understanding,

original: 'jug par mi 'dod pa med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug par mi 'dod pa med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there would be no desire to engage.

original: 'on te don byed pa'i ngo bo mi rtogs pa'i phyir de'i don du 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don byed pa'i ngo bo mi rtogs pa'i phyir de'i don du 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is because one does not understand the nature of the object that one engages in it,

original: ji ltar gzhan du rtogs pa la gzhan la 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan du rtogs pa la gzhan la 'jug pa yin /
translated: then how can one understand one thing and engage in another?

original: des na de'i nges pa nyid ni 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na de'i nges pa nyid ni 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of that is the application to engagement,

original: thabs rtogs pa ni ma yin no //üîΩ'di ni yod pa @90a * //
analyzed: thabs rtogs pa ni ma yin no // 'di ni yod pa @90a * //
translated: but it is not the understanding of the means.

original: ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed pa ma yin la /
translated: This is not so, because it is not the application to engagement.

original: sbyor bar byed pa ma yin pa thabs de ma yin pa nyid kyi nges pa gzhan dag yod kyang dgos pa ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa ma yin pa thabs de ma yin pa nyid kyi nges pa gzhan dag yod kyang dgos pa ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And if it is not the application, then even if there were another ascertainment that was not the means, it would be completely useless.

original: don byed pa sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa las dus phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba tshogs pa gzhan la ltos pa ni res 'ga' yin gyi /
analyzed: don byed pa sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa las dus phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba tshogs pa gzhan la ltos pa ni res 'ga' yin gyi /
translated: The subsequent occurrence of the cognition that establishes the object that is dependent on another collection is sometimes the case,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i shes pas nges par byed pa ni mi nus pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i shes pas nges par byed pa ni mi nus pa ma yin nam /
translated: but is it not the case that the cognition that establishes the object cannot ascertain it?

original: nus pa yin na ni sgrub par byed pa nges pas don byed pa la 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nus pa yin na ni sgrub par byed pa nges pas don byed pa la 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: If it is the capacity, then it is the instigator of engagement in the performance of an object‚Äôs function, because it is ascertained as the means of accomplishing it.

original: gzhan du nges la gzhan la ji ltar 'jug pa yin zhes bya ba brjod bya ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du nges la gzhan la ji ltar 'jug pa yin zhes bya ba brjod bya ma yin te /
translated: But how can it be ascertained as one thing and yet engage another?

original: dran pa dang mngon par 'dod pa dag gi skyed byed yin na 'jug par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa dang mngon par 'dod pa dag gi skyed byed yin na 'jug par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not a proper question, because if it is the producer of memory and desire, it is the instigator of engagement.

original: de yang tha snyad 'di ni srog dang bcas pa tsam yin no zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: de yang tha snyad 'di ni srog dang bcas pa tsam yin no zhes smos pa'o //
translated: And this is only a convention, as if it had life.

original: sgrub par byed pa dmigs pa yin na de las dran no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dmigs pa yin na de las dran no //
translated: If the means of accomplishment is the object, then memory is from that,üîΩand desire, engagement, and contact are also from that.

original: de las 'dod pa dang 'jug pa dang phrad pa yang yin no snyam du sems pas tshad mas ni don shes par bya ba yin gyi zhes zer ba la lan du /
analyzed: de las 'dod pa dang 'jug pa dang phrad pa yang yin no snyam du sems pas tshad mas ni don shes par bya ba yin gyi zhes zer ba la lan du /
translated: The response to the assertion that the object is known by means of valid knowledge is:

original: gang gi don du 'di rtsom pa //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi don du 'di rtsom pa // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For what purpose is this composed?

original: gal te nyams su myong ba la dran pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te nyams su myong ba la dran pa yin na /
translated: If memory is of experience,

original: ji ltar de la 'dod pa'am 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar de la 'dod pa'am 'jug pa yin /
translated: how can it be desire or engagement?

original: de sgrub par byed par 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de sgrub par byed par 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is asserted that it is the means of accomplishing it,

original: de yang thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang thob pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not obtained.

original: 'on te des bsgrub par bya ba don byed pa la yin na /
analyzed: 'on te des bsgrub par bya ba don byed pa la yin na /
translated: But if it is the case that the object to be established is the performance of an action,

original: de'i nges pa can ma yin na de la dran pa'am 'dod pa ji lta yin pa bsam dgos so //
analyzed: de'i nges pa can ma yin na de la dran pa'am 'dod pa ji lta yin pa bsam dgos so //
translated: then it must be considered how memory or desire can be of that, if it is not certain.

original: ma grub pa de ma nges pas //
analyzed: ma grub pa de ma nges pas //
translated: Since that which is not established is not certain,

original: bsgrub bya ste don byed pa'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa gang gi yin pa de ltar ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ste don byed pa'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa gang gi yin pa de ltar ro //
translated: it is the object to be established, and it is related to the nature of the performance of an action.

original: sgrub par byed pa nges pa yin yang don byed pa la the tshom za ba las ni 'jug pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nges pa yin yang don byed pa la the tshom za ba las ni 'jug pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Even if the proof is certain, engagement does not occur from doubt about the performance of an action.

original: thob bya don byed pa la sgrub par byed pa nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir dang / rig byed kyi shes pa las kyang me'i sbyin sreg sgrub byed nyid du nges pa yin na /
analyzed: thob bya don byed pa la sgrub par byed pa nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir dang / rig byed kyi shes pa las kyang me'i sbyin sreg sgrub byed nyid du nges pa yin na /
translated: This is because the proof is not certain with respect to the object to be obtained, the performance of an action, and because the knowledge from the Vedas is certain to accomplish the fire sacrifice.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur pa mtho ris kyi don byed pa la the tshom za bzhin du 'jug par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur pa mtho ris kyi don byed pa la the tshom za bzhin du 'jug par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would follow that one would engage in the performance of an action while doubting the existence of heaven.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i rjes su dpag pa las 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i rjes su dpag pa las 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: One engages in the performance of an action through inference that is similar to that.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: 'das pa'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the establishment of the activity of an object in the present is direct perception.

original: gang la 'jug pa de la tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir thabs kyis nges pa ni 'jug pa la @90b sbyor bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: gang la 'jug pa de la tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir thabs kyis nges pa ni 'jug pa la @90b sbyor bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
translated: Since it is not a valid cognition with regard to that which is being engaged, ascertainment by means of a method is not applied to engagement.

original: gal te gsal bar byas pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gal te gsal bar byas pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: With this idea in mind, he says, ‚ÄúIf it is that which is clarified.‚Äù

original: 'on te byung bar gyur pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kho na sgrub byed kyi shes pas nges par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te byung bar gyur pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kho na sgrub byed kyi shes pas nges par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But if you think that the ascertainment by the cognition that is the proof is only the establishment of the activity of an object that will occur following the occurrence of the object,

original: gal te don bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te don bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then he says, ‚ÄúIf it is the activity of an object.‚Äù

original: don sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: don sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The entity that establishes the object is the establishment of the activity of an object that will occur.

original: don byed pa ni sngon po la sogs ngo bo mthong ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po gzhan yin nam /
analyzed: don byed pa ni sngon po la sogs ngo bo mthong ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po gzhan yin nam /
translated: Is the activity of an object the entity that will occur from seeing the entity of blue and so on, or is it something else?

original: me la sogs pa la ni reg pa yin la /
analyzed: me la sogs pa la ni reg pa yin la /
translated: In the case of fire, etc., it is contact.

original: chu la sogs pa la ni btung ba dang / kun du reg pa dag yin te /
analyzed: chu la sogs pa la ni btung ba dang / kun du reg pa dag yin te /
translated: In the case of water, etc., it is both drinking and contact.

original: de lta bu thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa nyid kyis ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa nyid kyis ston pa yin no //
translated: The cognition that accomplishes all such is valid cognition.

original: de lta mod kyi de ni snang bzhin pa'i don nges par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi de ni snang bzhin pa'i don nges par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma yin la /
translated: However, it is valid cognition because it ascertains the object that appears to it.

original: ma nges pa la ni skad cig ma nyid bzhin du 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //üîΩnges pa yang 'di ni sngon po'i zhes skad cig ma gang la mthong ba de'i rgyun yul yin pa'am /
analyzed: ma nges pa la ni skad cig ma nyid bzhin du 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no // nges pa yang 'di ni sngon po'i zhes skad cig ma gang la mthong ba de'i rgyun yul yin pa'am /
translated: And in the case of non-ascertainment, it is valid cognition because it does not engage like the momentariness.

original: de dang tshogs pa gcig pa can gyi bskyed bya'i rgyun yul yin pa'o //
analyzed: de dang tshogs pa gcig pa can gyi bskyed bya'i rgyun yul yin pa'o //
translated: Ascertainment is when the object is the continuum of that moment in which it is seen, or the continuum to be produced that is in the same collection as that.

original: mthong ba ni de skyed par byed pa las de dang mtshungs pa'i yul la tshad mar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: mthong ba ni de skyed par byed pa las de dang mtshungs pa'i yul la tshad mar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: Seeing is valid with regard to the object that is similar to that produced by its cause.

original: de ni bdag nyid dam yul yang rung ste rjes su dpag pa bzhin du thob bya'i de ma thag par nges par byed pa las ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni bdag nyid dam yul yang rung ste rjes su dpag pa bzhin du thob bya'i de ma thag par nges par byed pa las ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: It is not a valid cognition, because it ascertains the object to be attained, such as the self or the object, immediately after the inference.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: so sor snang bzhin pa'i don la nges par byed pa nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: so sor snang bzhin pa'i don la nges par byed pa nyid kyis yin no //
translated: It is the ascertainment of the object that appears individually.

original: de nyid kyis na mngon sum ni rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mngon sum ni rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Therefore, direct perception is distinct from inference.

original: gang gis 'jal bar byed cing zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gis 'jal bar byed cing zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To this, he says, ‚ÄúBy what is it measured?‚Äù

original: bden te / 'di ni sngon po'o zhes bya ba ni sngon po ma yin pa las log pa ma yin yang sngon po ni sngon po gzhan las kyang log par nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bden te / 'di ni sngon po'o zhes bya ba ni sngon po ma yin pa las log pa ma yin yang sngon po ni sngon po gzhan las kyang log par nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is true that ‚ÄúThis is blue‚Äù does not distinguish blue from non-blue, but blue is ascertained as distinguished from another blue.

original: 'di ni dung la ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so ;
analyzed: 'di ni dung la ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so ;
translated: This is the same for the cognition of yellow in a conch and so on.

original: /'on te de ni gnod bya yin la /
analyzed: /'on te de ni gnod bya yin la /
translated: But that is what is to be refuted.

original: gnod bya ma yin pa ni tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod bya ma yin pa ni tshad ma yin te /
translated: The non-refuted is the valid cognition.

original: gnod pa can med pa las 'khrul par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa can med pa las 'khrul par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not established that error arises from the absence of a cause of error.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yul mi 'dzin pa kho na 'di'i gnod bya nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yul mi 'dzin pa kho na 'di'i gnod bya nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the object that will be apprehended the only thing that is harmed?

original: de 'di tshad mar mngon par 'dod pa la yang mtshungs so//
analyzed: de 'di tshad mar mngon par 'dod pa la yang mtshungs so//
translated: That is the same for the one who asserts that it is a valid means of knowledge.

original: @91a * // 'on te 'dzin pa yin yang gnod bya nyid du ni mi bden pa yin la /
analyzed: @91a * // 'on te 'dzin pa yin yang gnod bya nyid du ni mi bden pa yin la /
translated: But even if it is apprehended, it is not true that it is harmed.

original: gnod bya ma yin pa nyid du ni bden pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnod bya ma yin pa nyid du ni bden pa nyid yin no //
translated: But it is true that it is not harmed.

original: gal te de'i tshe nyid thob bya rtogs pa yin na ci'i don du 'jug par byed /
analyzed: gal te de'i tshe nyid thob bya rtogs pa yin na ci'i don du 'jug par byed /
translated: If the object to be obtained is realized at that time, for what purpose does one engage in it?

original: 'on te thob bya ma rtogs pa yin na de lta mod kyi nges pa yin pa ma rtogs ba de lta na yang nges pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa dang nges pa dag gi yul gcig nyid yin /
analyzed: 'on te thob bya ma rtogs pa yin na de lta mod kyi nges pa yin pa ma rtogs ba de lta na yang nges pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa dang nges pa dag gi yul gcig nyid yin /
translated: But if the object to be obtained is not realized, then it is just as you say. Even though it is not realized, it is ascertained. In that case, how can the object of desire and the object of ascertainment be the same?

original: 'on te rtogs pa'i rnam par dpyod pa'i nges pa rjes su dran pa las de lta bur nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa'i rnam par dpyod pa'i nges pa rjes su dran pa las de lta bur nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that ascertainment is from the memory of the analysis of the object that is realized,

original: de lta yin du zin kyang rnam par dpyad pa'i yul la rtogs pa'i bya ba la de ni rtogs pa med pa las 'byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta yin du zin kyang rnam par dpyad pa'i yul la rtogs pa'i bya ba la de ni rtogs pa med pa las 'byung ba yin gyi /
translated: Even if that were so, the object of analysis is the activity of understanding, and that arises from the absence of understanding.

original: nges pa rtogs pa dang lhan cig yul gcig pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa rtogs pa dang lhan cig yul gcig pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not simultaneous with the ascertainment of understanding.

original: byed par nges pa ma yin yang don tsam las nges pa yin na 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: byed par nges pa ma yin yang don tsam las nges pa yin na 'jug pa yin la /
translated: Even if it is not ascertained as the agent, if it is ascertained from the mere object, it engages.

original: rig byed las kyang mtho ris la ma nges pa yin yang /
analyzed: rig byed las kyang mtho ris la ma nges pa yin yang /
translated: Even if it is not ascertained for heaven in the Vedas,

original: me'i sbyin sreg la nges pa yin na bye brag med pa las 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: me'i sbyin sreg la nges pa yin na bye brag med pa las 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: if it is ascertained for fire sacrifice, it engages without distinction. This is the meaning.

original: de lta yin na mngon sum bzhin du rig byed las byung ba yang tshad mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na mngon sum bzhin du rig byed las byung ba yang tshad mar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then like direct perception, what arises from the Vedas would also be valid cognition.

original: don byed pa'i ngo bor sngar mngon sum gyis mthong ba yin na de dang 'dra bar mthong ba las srid pa ni de'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir de'i rigs su 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: don byed pa'i ngo bor sngar mngon sum gyis mthong ba yin na de dang 'dra bar mthong ba las srid pa ni de'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir de'i rigs su 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the essence of a functioning thing is seen before by direct perception, then what is seen as similar to that is of its kind because it has that nature.

original: rig byed la ni de ltar mthong ba'am /
analyzed: rig byed la ni de ltar mthong ba'am /
translated: But the Vedas are not seen in that way.

original: de'i rigs yin pa'am /
analyzed: de'i rigs yin pa'am /
translated: Or, is it of that kind?

original: srid par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: srid par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not make existence possible,

original: mthong ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen.

original: de med pa la de srid pa ni ri rab kyi steng na ri bong gi rva srid pa bzhin du the tshom yod pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de med pa la de srid pa ni ri rab kyi steng na ri bong gi rva srid pa bzhin du the tshom yod pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Since it is doubtful whether that which does not exist makes existence possible, like the existence of a rabbit‚Äôs horns on the peak of Mt. Sumeru, it is not a means of valid cognition.

original: de bstan pa ni /üîΩrang gi ngo bo don byed pa'i //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni / rang gi ngo bo don byed pa'i //
translated: The demonstration of that is as follows:

original: nges pa rig pa ma yin phyir //
analyzed: nges pa rig pa ma yin phyir //
translated: Because the ascertainment of the nature of an object‚Äôs causal efficiency

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is not a cognition.

original: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te rnam par shes pa la ni thams cad du don byed pa dang 'brel pa kho na yin par rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan pa yin te rnam par shes pa la ni thams cad du don byed pa dang 'brel pa kho na yin par rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being taught: it is understood that consciousness is always connected with the causal efficiency of an object.

original: 'di sngon po'o zhes bya ba ni don byed par nus pa'i ngo bo yin gyi dngos po tsam ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di sngon po'o zhes bya ba ni don byed par nus pa'i ngo bo yin gyi dngos po tsam ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is blue‚Äù is the nature of an object that is capable of causal efficiency, not just the mere thing.

original: nus pa nyid kyang 'brel pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: nus pa nyid kyang 'brel pa kho na yin la /
translated: Causal efficiency is just the connection.

original: de nyid ni de kho na nyid kyis shes pa'i yul yin zhes bya ba yang de dang der bstan zin to //
analyzed: de nyid ni de kho na nyid kyis shes pa'i yul yin zhes bya ba yang de dang der bstan zin to //
translated: And that is the object of knowledge of reality. This has been taught in various places.

original: shes pa la ni gang la nges pa can gyi don byed pa thob pa de la de'i 'bras bu nyid dam /üîΩde'i rgyu nyid dam /
analyzed: shes pa la ni gang la nges pa can gyi don byed pa thob pa de la de'i 'bras bu nyid dam / de'i rgyu nyid dam /
translated: That which obtains the result of ascertaining the object in consciousness is its result.üîΩThat which is the cause of that is its cause.üîΩ

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid las tshad ma nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid las tshad ma nyid yin no //
translated: That cognition which obtains the attainment of a definite object-to-be-done is valid cognition in regard to that object, either as its result or as its cause or as its nature.

original: de lta yin na gang la de'i @91b tshe kho na don byed pa med pa'i shes pa de ji ltar tshad ma yin /
analyzed: de lta yin na gang la de'i @91b tshe kho na don byed pa med pa'i shes pa de ji ltar tshad ma yin /
translated: If that were so, then how could a cognition that does not have the object-to-be-done at that time be valid cognition?

original: ji ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: It could not be!

original: de yang don gyi bya ba byed pa gal te don gsal bar byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de yang don gyi bya ba byed pa gal te don gsal bar byed pa ma yin na /
translated: And if the object-to-be-done is not the manifestation of the object,

original: de dang rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad la sogs pa don med pa dang khyad par ci zhig yod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no ;
analyzed: de dang rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad la sogs pa don med pa dang khyad par ci zhig yod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no ;
translated: then what is the difference between that and the unreal hair and so on seen by one with an eye disease?

original: / de'i phyir rig byed la don byed pa nyid la mi slu ba med do //
analyzed: / de'i phyir rig byed la don byed pa nyid la mi slu ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no nondeceptiveness in regard to the object-to-be-done in the case of the Vedas.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa la ni don byed pa la slu bar byed pa med do //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa la ni don byed pa la slu bar byed pa med do //
translated: And there is no deceptiveness in regard to the object-to-be-done in the case of perception and so on.

original: de lta bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of that is as follows:

original: mi slu ba med pa'i rig byed la sogs pa las rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang tshad ma thams cad la skur pa 'debs ba sel bar byed pa yang bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: mi slu ba med pa'i rig byed la sogs pa las rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang tshad ma thams cad la skur pa 'debs ba sel bar byed pa yang bstan pa yin no //
translated: It also teaches the refutation of the denial of all valid cognitions, such as inference, etc., and of the nondeceptive Vedas, etc.

original: don de sreg pa la sogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: don de sreg pa la sogs par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the agent of the burning, etc., of the object.

original: byed pa po nyid yin par bshad pa yin na /
analyzed: byed pa po nyid yin par bshad pa yin na /
translated: If it is explained as the agent,

original: khyad par ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the distinction is not taught.

original: don yongs su bcad nas zhes bya bas don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don yongs su bcad nas zhes bya bas don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having ascertained the object, because of the understanding of the object.

original: don zhes bya bas kyang nus pa'i ngo bo bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don zhes bya bas kyang nus pa'i ngo bo bstan pa ni /
translated: By the word object, the nature of the capacity is taught.

original: don byed nus pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: don byed nus pa gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever is able to perform a function

original: de'i 'dir don dam yod pa yin //
analyzed: de'i 'dir don dam yod pa yin //
translated: that is here the ultimate existence.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is stated by the words.

original: de'i phyir don byed pa la mi slu ba nyid ni thams cad du rtogs pas grub pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don byed pa la mi slu ba nyid ni thams cad du rtogs pas grub pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, nondeceptiveness with regard to the performance of a function is established everywhere.

original: de yang / kha cig tu de bden pa der ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
analyzed: de yang / kha cig tu de bden pa der ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
translated: And that is true in some cases, because it is valid cognition there.

original: gzhan du ni mi bden pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni mi bden pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: But in other cases it is not true, and therefore it is not valid cognition.

original: de yang gzhan nyid las de tha snyad kyi ming can las grub pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan las zhes brjod la /
analyzed: de yang gzhan nyid las de tha snyad kyi ming can las grub pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan las zhes brjod la /
translated: Moreover, it is called ‚Äúother‚Äù because it is established from the name of the conventional.

original: don rtogs pa nyid du ni rang rig gi ngo bo rig pa kho na yin par nges pa'o //
analyzed: don rtogs pa nyid du ni rang rig gi ngo bo rig pa kho na yin par nges pa'o //
translated: It is ascertained that the nature of reflexive awareness is only the awareness of the object.

original: de'i phyir rig byed bzhin du don byed pa la tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rig byed bzhin du don byed pa la tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, like the Vedas, it is not a valid cognition in regard to the performance of a function.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa yin par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that it is the basis of dispute.

original: slu bar byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni da lta bar nye bar bstan pa kho nas yin zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: slu bar byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni da lta bar nye bar bstan pa kho nas yin zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not deceptive‚Äù is intended to show that it is only taught as present.

original: mi slu bar nges pa can yang rgyun du 'byung ba'i shes pa rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig gis ni tshad ma ma yin na /
analyzed: mi slu bar nges pa can yang rgyun du 'byung ba'i shes pa rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig gis ni tshad ma ma yin na /
translated: If a consciousness that is ascertained to be non-deceptive is not a valid cognition because it is a consciousness that occurs continuously due to some cause,

original: mi slu ba ma yin pa lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi slu ba ma yin pa lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: what need is there to mention that it is not non-deceptive?

original: don yongs su bcad nas zhes bya ba ni don byed pa dang 'brel pa rtogs pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: don yongs su bcad nas zhes bya ba ni don byed pa dang 'brel pa rtogs pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving ascertained the object‚Äù teaches that it is the realization of the connection with the performance of a function.

original: don byed pa la slu bar byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel par bden pa nyid kyi tshad ma nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: don byed pa la slu bar byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel par bden pa nyid kyi tshad ma nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not deceptive with regard to the object‚Äôs function‚Äù indicates that the truth of the valid knowledge is related to that.

original: gzhan gyis bshad pa yang mi bden pa'i don du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan gyis bshad pa yang mi bden pa'i don du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the case that what is explained by others is not a true object?

original: @92a * // de lta na 'brel pa can dag gi gnyis po dag kyang yod pas 'brel pa bden pa nyid du bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: @92a * // de lta na 'brel pa can dag gi gnyis po dag kyang yod pas 'brel pa bden pa nyid du bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: In that case, since the two of the related objects exist, the truth of the relation is indicated.

original: rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad la sogs pa dang bye brag med pa'i phyir gzhan gang yang rung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad la sogs pa dang bye brag med pa'i phyir gzhan gang yang rung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not any other, because it is not different from the hair and so on seen by one with myodesopsia.

original: don yongs su bcad na zhes bya ba sgrub byed dang don byed pa'i zhes bya ba bsgrub bya dang / 'jug bzhin pa zhes bya bas ni mi slu ba'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa yin /
analyzed: don yongs su bcad na zhes bya ba sgrub byed dang don byed pa'i zhes bya ba bsgrub bya dang / 'jug bzhin pa zhes bya bas ni mi slu ba'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa yin /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the object is ascertained‚Äù is the proof, and ‚Äúthe object‚Äôs function‚Äù is the probandum, and ‚Äúis engaged‚Äù indicates the reason for nondeception.

original: 'jug pa tsam gyi 'bras bu la tshad ma ma yin la /
analyzed: 'jug pa tsam gyi 'bras bu la tshad ma ma yin la /
translated: It is not that mere engagement is the effect of valid knowledge.

original: rig byed las byung ba ni 'jug pa tsam 'bras bu yin la /
analyzed: rig byed las byung ba ni 'jug pa tsam 'bras bu yin la /
translated: The effect of mere engagement is the result of the Vedas.

original: de ni skye ba 'di 'am /
analyzed: de ni skye ba 'di 'am /
translated: It is either in this lifeüîΩ

original: skye ba gzhan nyid du don byed pa 'thob pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: skye ba gzhan nyid du don byed pa 'thob pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: It is not the cause of the attainment of the object‚Äôs function in this life or in another life,

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / the tshom za ba'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / the tshom za ba'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: because it is not seen and because there is doubt.

original: rtogs par byed pa nyid tshad ma nyid yin yang /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa nyid tshad ma nyid yin yang /
translated: Even though the means of valid knowledge is the cause of the ascertainment of the object,

original: de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyes bu'i don te /
analyzed: de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyes bu'i don te /
translated: it is the object of the person who will come into existence,

original: yul la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag la yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yul la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag la yod pa yin gyi /
translated: because the means of valid knowledge, perception and inference, exist in regard to the object,üîΩbut not in regard to the Vedas, etc.

original: rig byed la sogs pa la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rig byed la sogs pa la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is what is taught.

original: 'di dag gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni me la nges pa nyid kyi du ba'i shes pa las me la nges pa ni me ma yin pa dgag pa med na ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni me la nges pa nyid kyi du ba'i shes pa las me la nges pa ni me ma yin pa dgag pa med na ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not by these, means that the knowledge of smoke as ascertained in fire is not ascertained in fire without the exclusion of non-fire.

original: thabs las byung ba la 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed pa nyid ni nges pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thabs las byung ba la 'jug pa la sbyor bar byed pa nyid ni nges pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment is taught to be the application to the engagement in the means of valid knowledge,

original: don byed ba'i shes pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: don byed ba'i shes pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: which is the knowledge of the object‚Äôs function.

original: de don byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid don byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de don byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid don byed pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit performs a function‚Äù is that it is a function,

original: sgrub par byed pa yang de yin la shes par byed pa yang de yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang de yin la shes par byed pa yang de yin no //
translated: it is an establishment, and it is a cognition.

original: thabs las byung ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir sngar med pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: thabs las byung ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir sngar med pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the effect of a means of knowledge something that did not exist previously, because it is something that comes into existence?

original: de'i tshe de ji ltar shes pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de'i tshe de ji ltar shes pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: How can it be a cognition at that time?

original: sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response is: ‚ÄúThe previous cognition that is a means of knowledge.‚Äù

original: gal te 'di lta bur dmigs nas de dang phrad pa'i dus su 'byung bar mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di lta bur dmigs nas de dang phrad pa'i dus su 'byung bar mthong ba yin na /
translated: If it is seen that it comes into existence at the time of contact after being observed in this way,

original: des na 'dir yang phrad pa'i dus su 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: des na 'dir yang phrad pa'i dus su 'byung ba yin la /
translated: then it also comes into existence at the time of contact here.

original: gal te don de bstan pa nyid du nges par 'gyur bar byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te don de bstan pa nyid du nges par 'gyur bar byed pa ma yin na /
translated: If it is not ascertained that it is the teaching of that object,

original: sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa don yin te /
analyzed: sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa don yin te /
translated: then the previous means of knowledge is not the object.

original: tha dad pa'am cig shos kyi shes par de'i tshe 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'am cig shos kyi shes par de'i tshe 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is either different or the same as the cognition.

original: nges par gzung ba ni nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba ni nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt ascertainment a certainty?

original: mngon sum ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba la snga ma rang bzhin du nges par gzung bar 'gyur bar byed pa @92b ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba la snga ma rang bzhin du nges par gzung bar 'gyur bar byed pa @92b ma yin te /
translated: Direct perception does not cause one to apprehend the future as the nature of the past.üîΩ

original: nye ba'i snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: nye ba'i snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Direct perception does not ascertain the nature of the future, because it is a proximate appearance.

original: snga ma'i rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: snga ma'i rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThe nature of the former . . .‚Äù

original: ji ltar sngon po'i shes pa ni de yod na gdon mi za bar yod pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: ji ltar sngon po'i shes pa ni de yod na gdon mi za bar yod pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: Just as the consciousness of blue exists when it exists, it is its nature.

original: de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang snga ma yod na gdon mi za bar yod pas rang bzhin kho na yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang snga ma yod na gdon mi za bar yod pas rang bzhin kho na yin te /
translated: In the same way, the future is the nature of the former, because when the former exists, the future exists.

original: rang bzhin gyi tha snyad ni de dag tsam gyi rgyu mtshan las yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi tha snyad ni de dag tsam gyi rgyu mtshan las yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the term nature is a reason for that alone.üîΩThe response to that is ‚ÄúIn reality . . .‚Äù

original: dngos su na zhes bya ba ni de yod na gdon mi za bar yod pa kho na rang bzhin tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: dngos su na zhes bya ba ni de yod na gdon mi za bar yod pa kho na rang bzhin tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: The reason for the term nature is that when it exists, it exists without fail.

original: gcig pa nyid la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Because identity and so on do not exist.

original: gcig ces bya ba ni cung zad kyang med de rgya che bar mthong ba las steng dang 'og gi cha la sogs pa rnams kyi yul dang phyogs la sogs pa'i gcig las gcig gi dbye bas rang bzhin tha dad par rig pa yin na /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba ni cung zad kyang med de rgya che bar mthong ba las steng dang 'og gi cha la sogs pa rnams kyi yul dang phyogs la sogs pa'i gcig las gcig gi dbye bas rang bzhin tha dad par rig pa yin na /
translated: There is not the slightest thing that is one, because it is seen to be extensive.

original: gcig nyid kyi tha snyad kyi yul med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde las 'byung ba'i mthu yis ni //
analyzed: gcig nyid kyi tha snyad kyi yul med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // de las 'byung ba'i mthu yis ni //
translated: If it is known to have a different nature due to the division of one from another in terms of the parts of above, below, etc., then it follows that there is no object of the convention of one.

original: zhes bya bas bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: zhes bya bas bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: If it is asserted that it is explained by ‚Äúdue to the power of arising from that,‚Äù

original: yang na gdon mi za bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: yang na gdon mi za bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: then it is said that ‚Äúarising is definitely not tenable.‚Äù

original: ji ltar snang ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis tha dad pa yin gyi gcig nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis tha dad pa yin gyi gcig nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: As for how it appears, it is different in terms of earlier and later, but it is not one.

original: de lta mod kyi snga na yod na 'byung ba'i phyir phyi ma ni 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi snga na yod na 'byung ba'i phyir phyi ma ni 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: However, if it existed earlier, it would arise later, so the later is the effect.

original: de lta yin na 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa la gcig pa dang du ma'i tha snyad gang la yin /
analyzed: de lta yin na 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa la gcig pa dang du ma'i tha snyad gang la yin /
translated: If that is the case, then what is the basis for the conventions of one and many in terms of grasping and not grasping?

original: gang la 'dzin pa na gang zhig gdon mi za bar 'dzin par byed pa de ni de las tha mi dad pa yin la gzhan ni tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la 'dzin pa na gang zhig gdon mi za bar 'dzin par byed pa de ni de las tha mi dad pa yin la gzhan ni tha dad pa yin no //
translated: When something is grasped, that which necessarily grasps it is not different from it, but something else is different from it.

original: 'dzin pa yin yang yul dang rnam pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa yin yang yul dang rnam pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba ni tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Even though it is a grasper, the distinction of object, aspect, etc. does not make it different,

original: 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa'i go skabs med pa nyid kyis don med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa'i go skabs med pa nyid kyis don med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be meaningless, since there would be no opportunity for grasping or non-grasping.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni snga ma bzung ba yin yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni snga ma bzung ba yin yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: Even though the past is grasped, it is not grasped, so it is not its nature.

original: de lta mod kyi de la ma 'khrul pa'i phyir 'bras bu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi de la ma 'khrul pa'i phyir 'bras bu ni ma yin no //
translated: However, since there is no error in that, it is not a result.

original: de lta yin dang rgyu las 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang rgyu las 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If that were so, a result would be known from a cause,

original: de ni mi rigs te rgyu rnams ni gdon mi za bar de dang ldan pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te rgyu rnams ni gdon mi za bar de dang ldan pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but that is not reasonable, because it is accepted that the causes are necessarily not endowed with it, i.e., error.

original: bye brag can gyi rgyu ni 'bras bu la mi 'khrul pa can yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bye brag can gyi rgyu ni 'bras bu la mi 'khrul pa can yin no zhe na /
translated: A specific cause is one that is not mistaken with regard to its effect.

original: de lta ma yin na rgyu'i bye brag de 'bras bu bzhin @93a * //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rgyu'i bye brag de 'bras bu bzhin @93a * //
translated: If it were not so, then that specific cause would be like the effect,

original: du ma 'khrul pa can yin pas 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: du ma 'khrul pa can yin pas 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: and it would be the effect itself, since it is not mistaken with regard to it.

original: gzhan gyis gzhan las ma 'khrul ba ni de las byung ba las gzhan ma yin no zhes rjes su dpag pa la rtogs par bya ba yin par ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan las ma 'khrul ba ni de las byung ba las gzhan ma yin no zhes rjes su dpag pa la rtogs par bya ba yin par ni /
translated: That another is not mistaken with regard to another is to be understood from the inference,üîΩ‚ÄúHow can there be certainty that another exists

original: gzhan du gzhan ni gzhan dag dang // nges par yod pa'i nges pa gang //
analyzed: gzhan du gzhan ni gzhan dag dang // nges par yod pa'i nges pa gang //
translated: only in relation to another?‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las sam zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no //üîΩkhyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de nyid la yod na yod pa'i phyir 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las sam zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no // khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de nyid la yod na yod pa'i phyir 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and ‚Äúfrom the fact of the relation of cause and effect,‚Äù as has been stated.üîΩBecause of pervasion, it is the effect, because it exists when that exists.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nges par 'byung zhes bya ba ci las yin /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nges par 'byung zhes bya ba ci las yin /
translated: What is the basis for the statement, ‚ÄúThe nature of the effect is ascertained as that from which it arises‚Äù?

original: yul mtshungs pa la de ltar nges pa yang ji ltar yin /
analyzed: yul mtshungs pa la de ltar nges pa yang ji ltar yin /
translated: How can there be such a determination with regard to a similar object?

original: 'di mngon sum ni yul ni ma yin pas mngon sum gyi yul ring por gnas pa'i 'dzin byed kyang ji ltar yin snyam pa'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: 'di mngon sum ni yul ni ma yin pas mngon sum gyi yul ring por gnas pa'i 'dzin byed kyang ji ltar yin snyam pa'i dgongs pas /
translated: Since this is not a direct perception, how could it be a grasper that endures for a long time, the object of direct perception?

original: tha dad pa'i khyab par byed pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i khyab par byed pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: With this doubt in mind, he says, ‚ÄúThat which is the pervader of the different . . .‚Äù

original: khyab par byed pa ni 'di 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa ni 'di 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The pervader is so called because it arises.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yod pa ni gnyi ga dag gis kyang khas blangs pa yin yang de ji ltar rtogs pa yin te 'di nyid la log par rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yod pa ni gnyi ga dag gis kyang khas blangs pa yin yang de ji ltar rtogs pa yin te 'di nyid la log par rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Although both accept that existence is that which arises, how could it be understood? The point is that this is a mistaken understanding.

original: gang gi tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba bskyed bya yin pa de'i tshe snga ma yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba bskyed bya yin pa de'i tshe snga ma yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: When that which arises is a product, doesn‚Äôt the prior existent exist?

original: de ni thams cad la 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gang gis kyang bskyed bya ji ltar yin /üîΩgang gi tshe ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba bskyed pa yin na /
analyzed: de ni thams cad la 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gang gis kyang bskyed bya ji ltar yin / gang gi tshe ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba bskyed pa yin na /
translated: Since that is not accepted in any system, how could it be a product of anything?üîΩWhen that which arises is a product,

original: de'i tshe yang snga ma zhig yin na ji ltar skyed byed yin /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang snga ma zhig yin na ji ltar skyed byed yin /
translated: if the prior existent is destroyed, how could it be a producer?

original: 'on te gang gi tshe de nyid bskyed bya yin pa de lta na gnyi ga yang med la /üîΩgang zhig gang gis bskyed bya yin snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: 'on te gang gi tshe de nyid bskyed bya yin pa de lta na gnyi ga yang med la / gang zhig gang gis bskyed bya yin snyam du sems pas /
translated: But if you think that it is that which is generated, then neither is possible.üîΩWhat is that which is generated by what?

original: ma skyes pa ji ltar rgyu yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: ma skyes pa ji ltar rgyu yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: If you think that the non-arisen is a cause,

original: lan ni / skyes pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni / skyes pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is: ‚ÄúThe arisen also is not a cause.‚Äù

original: snga ma ni rang gi rgyu las skyes bzhin pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: snga ma ni rang gi rgyu las skyes bzhin pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po la ltos pa yin te /
translated: The previous statement ‚ÄúThe non-arisen does not generate the non-arisen‚Äù refers to the entity that is in the process of arising in dependence on its own cause.

original: gzhan du na 'di de nyid la ji ltar 'byung ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'di de nyid la ji ltar 'byung ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, how could it be that which is arisen?

original: gal te de yod na 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dag tsam ni rgyu mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de yod na 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dag tsam ni rgyu mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: If you think that if it exists, it arises, that alone is not a reason.

original: de lta mod kyi gang gis yod pa dang / skye ba dang / sgrub par byed pa dang bya ba yang rung ba gtso bor byas nas 'byung ba des drangs pa lta bur gang 'gyur ba de'i rgyu de yin no snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gang gis yod pa dang / skye ba dang / sgrub par byed pa dang bya ba yang rung ba gtso bor byas nas 'byung ba des drangs pa lta bur gang 'gyur ba de'i rgyu de yin no snyam du sems pas /
translated: However, if you think that the cause of that which is existent, arisen, established, or active is that which is primary, and that which is drawn by that is the cause of that,

original: 'di yod na 'di 'byung zhes @93b pa la ;
analyzed: 'di yod na 'di 'byung zhes @93b pa la ;
translated: ‚ÄúIf this exists, that arises‚Äù

original: de yod na 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba 'di ni rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi yod pa nyid bye brag yin te /
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba 'di ni rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi yod pa nyid bye brag yin te /
translated: means ‚Äúif this exists, that arises.‚Äù This is the specific characteristic of existence that is the cause.

original: skye ba la sogs pa rnams ni 'di nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa rnams ni 'di nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because arising and so on are included within this, the treatise states:

original: yod dang skye sogs dngos po yi //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yod dang skye sogs dngos po yi // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Existence, arising, and so on are entities.

original: ji ltar 'di rnams kyi bye brag rtogs par grub pa yin pa de bzhin du khongs su gtogs pa la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di rnams kyi bye brag rtogs par grub pa yin pa de bzhin du khongs su gtogs pa la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that just as the specific characteristics of these are established, so too are they included within this.

original: gnyid stug pos non pa'i yang /
analyzed: gnyid stug pos non pa'i yang /
translated: When one is overcome by deep sleep,

original: rmi lam rtsom pa na 'byung ba'i sems bye brag ma lus pa dang bral bas nye bar mtshon pa 'gro ba'i tshe rtsva la kun du rig pa'i rnam par shes pa bzhin du bsam pa tsam skye ba yin la /
analyzed: rmi lam rtsom pa na 'byung ba'i sems bye brag ma lus pa dang bral bas nye bar mtshon pa 'gro ba'i tshe rtsva la kun du rig pa'i rnam par shes pa bzhin du bsam pa tsam skye ba yin la /
translated: when one begins to dream, the mind that arises is devoid of all specific characteristics. It is merely a thought that arises like the consciousness that perceives grass when one is traveling.

original: de las sad pa ni sems skye ba yin no snyam pa'i dgongs pas lus la sogs pa'ang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de las sad pa ni sems skye ba yin no snyam pa'i dgongs pas lus la sogs pa'ang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe body, etc.‚Äù is stated because the mind arises from the body, etc.

original: goms pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bye brag rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni de'i bye brag med pa las lus la sogs pa bzhin sems tsam skye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don
analyzed: goms pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bye brag rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni de'i bye brag med pa las lus la sogs pa bzhin sems tsam skye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don
translated: The meaning is that a conceptual consciousness that follows the specific attributes of what arises from development and is engaged in the forward and reverse processes does not arise as mere mind, like the body, etc., which do not have those specific attributes.

original: to // gang gi phyir khongs su gtogs pa de'i phyir 'di yod na 'di 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa'i yul ni de dag tsam yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: to // gang gi phyir khongs su gtogs pa de'i phyir 'di yod na 'di 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes pa'i yul ni de dag tsam yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following is stated to show that the objects of the consciousness that thinks ‚ÄúIf this exists, that arises,‚Äù etc., are only those things that are included in the forward and reverse processes.

original: des na rang gi ngo bo las //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na rang gi ngo bo las // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it arises from its own nature.

original: shes pa 'di sngar yod pa'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa 'di sngar yod pa'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: This consciousness does not arise at a time when it already exists,

original: de'i tshe phyi ma med pa'i phyir dang / gnyi ga la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe phyi ma med pa'i phyir dang / gnyi ga la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time the future does not exist and because it is dependent on both.

original: phyi ma'i dus su 'byung ba de'i tshe ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma'i dus su 'byung ba de'i tshe ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It will occur in the future, at the time of the effect.

original: snga ma med pa yin pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byung bar gyur pa la yang med pa nyid du bye brag med do zhes bstan pa'i don du /
analyzed: snga ma med pa yin pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byung bar gyur pa la yang med pa nyid du bye brag med do zhes bstan pa'i don du /
translated: Since the prior non-existence is the same in both the future and the present, the difference between the future and the present is not non-existence.üîΩIn order to demonstrate this, he says,

original: 'bras bu'i dus su ni zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus su ni zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúAt the time of the effect, the future effect does not exist.‚Äù

original: 'byung bar gyur pa ni de rtogs pa'i dus su yod pa ma yin du zin pa de ltar na yang /
analyzed: 'byung bar gyur pa ni de rtogs pa'i dus su yod pa ma yin du zin pa de ltar na yang /
translated: Even though the future effect does not exist at the time of its realization,

original: de yod pa nyid na 'byung 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yod pa nyid na 'byung 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is still called ‚Äúfuture‚Äù because it will exist.

original: nges par 'byung pa'i phyir phyi ma 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: nges par 'byung pa'i phyir phyi ma 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: Since it is certain to occur, it is the future effect.üîΩThe same is true of the prior non-existence.

original: 'di ni snga ma la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni snga ma la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he says,
