analyzed: de nyid kyang mi 'dod pa bsam pa yang rnyed par bla ba yin no //
translated: It is also reasonable to think that this is the definition of valid cognition that is sought.

original: 'di lta bu'i bstan bcos ni don dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos de ni ma mthong ba la tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig las /üîΩlkog tu gyur pa las tshad ma yin na thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes pa ni tshad ma gzhan la rung ba'i shes pa tsam nyid la sogs pa mthong bar byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i bstan bcos ni don dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos de ni ma mthong ba la tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig las / lkog tu gyur pa las tshad ma yin na thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes pa ni tshad ma gzhan la rung ba'i shes pa tsam nyid la sogs pa mthong bar byed pa yin yang /
translated: Such a treatise is not a treatise that has a purpose.

original: 'di lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: If it were a valid cognition with regard to what is hidden, then the cognition of an omniscient being would be a valid cognition with regard to mere cognition that is suitable for another valid cognition, but it is not like that, so it is not a valid cognition.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni gang zhig gang gi tshe mthong bar byed pa de ni de'i tshe de nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di la mtshan nyid kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni gang zhig gang gi tshe mthong bar byed pa de ni de'i tshe de nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di la mtshan nyid kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skyon med do //
translated: As for inference, when something is made evident by something, it is that very thing, so there is no fault of not engaging with the definition.

original: bstan bcos kyis mthong ba'i don nyid dam phyi rol rig pa ni gnod pa med pa las yin la /
analyzed: bstan bcos kyis mthong ba'i don nyid dam phyi rol rig pa ni gnod pa med pa las yin la /
translated: The object seen by the treatise or external awareness is from what is unobstructed.

original: mi slu ba yang slu ba med pa ni gnod pa can med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: mi slu ba yang slu ba med pa ni gnod pa can med pa kho na ste /
translated: And nondeceptive is only when there is no obstruction.

original: gnod pa can dang bral ba don rig pa kho na don byed pa rig pa yin pa'i phyir skyes bu'i don rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skyon yang spangs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gnod pa can dang bral ba don rig pa kho na don byed pa rig pa yin pa'i phyir skyes bu'i don rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skyon yang spangs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: and the meaning-generality alone, which is free from the fault of being deceptive, is the meaning-generality that performs a function. Therefore, the fault of not engaging in the purpose of a person is also avoided.

original: re zhig shes pa gnyis pa ni shes pa snga mas ma bsgrub pa yin na /
analyzed: re zhig shes pa gnyis pa ni shes pa snga mas ma bsgrub pa yin na /
translated: If the second cognition is not established by the former cognition,

original: de tsam la ni dgos pa med pas mi slu ba can ma yin pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ni khyab ches pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam la ni dgos pa med pas mi slu ba can ma yin pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ni khyab ches pa ma yin no //
translated: then it is not necessary, and since it is not nondeceptive, the definition is not too broad.

original: de tsam gyi dgongs pas gzung ba la 'dzin pa'i shes pa bsal bar nus pa yin la /
analyzed: de tsam gyi dgongs pas gzung ba la 'dzin pa'i shes pa bsal bar nus pa yin la /
translated: The object-universal that is the referent of the mere word is capable of being eliminated by the apprehending cognition that is the referent of the mere word.

original: mi slu ba can 'dzin pas ni ma yin la /
analyzed: mi slu ba can 'dzin pas ni ma yin la /
translated: But it is not eliminated by the apprehending cognition that is nondeceptive.

original: sngar yod pa tsam gyis rtogs par byed pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar yod pa tsam gyis rtogs par byed pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that it is realized by the mere existence of the object-universal.

original: skyes bu'i don la mkho ba ma yin pa ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid sems pas brtson par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir de spangs nas rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams don bzhin du mi slu ba can nyid la brtson par byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: skyes bu'i don la mkho ba ma yin pa ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid sems pas brtson par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir de spangs nas rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams don bzhin du mi slu ba can nyid la brtson par byed pa yin na ni /
translated: The definition of valid cognition is not something that is necessary for the purpose of human beings, because it is not something that one should strive to understand by reflection. Therefore, having abandoned that, those who are wise should strive for non-deceptiveness in accordance with the meaning.

original: de lta bu la skyon ci yang med do //
analyzed: de lta bu la skyon ci yang med do //
translated: There is no fault at all in that.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa tsam 'ba' zhig kyang khas blang bar bya ba yin pa la skyon med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa tsam 'ba' zhig kyang khas blang bar bya ba yin pa la skyon med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that there is no fault in accepting mere statements by others is:

original: ma shes don gyi gsal @99a * //
analyzed: ma shes don gyi gsal @99a * //
translated: Even the clarifier of the meaning not understood

original: byed kyang // zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byed kyang // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is the eye of the world.

original: mngon sum la sogs par rung ba'i dngos po la yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes mthong bar byed pa yin zhing /
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs par rung ba'i dngos po la yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes mthong bar byed pa yin zhing /
translated: Even with respect to a thing suitable as direct perception and so on, the knowledge of the Omniscient One is the clarifier of the seeing.

original: 'jig rten la tshad ma nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten la tshad ma nyid yin te /
translated: It is valid cognition for the world,

original: de med na mngon sum la sogs pa tsam gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa la yang rtogs par byed pas tshad mar 'dod do //
analyzed: de med na mngon sum la sogs pa tsam gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa la yang rtogs par byed pas tshad mar 'dod do //
translated: because without it, one would not understand by direct perception and so on alone, and because it is asserted to be valid cognition since it causes one to understand what is not understood.

original: rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa ni go bar byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: rig byed las byung ba'i shes pa ni go bar byed pa yin yang /
translated: Although the cognition that arises from the Vedas is an instrument of knowledge,

original: rab rib can gyi shes pa bzhin du de'i rtogs bya'i don nyid ma rtogs pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab rib can gyi shes pa bzhin du de'i rtogs bya'i don nyid ma rtogs pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: it is not a valid cognition because, like the cognition of one who has an eye disease, it does not comprehend the object that is to be comprehended.

original: don byed pa la bya ba byed pa'i dngos po ni don yin no //
analyzed: don byed pa la bya ba byed pa'i dngos po ni don yin no //
translated: An object is that which is capable of performing a function.

original: de yang rig byed la ni go bar dka' ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang rig byed la ni go bar dka' ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is difficult to understand that the Vedas are capable of performing a function,

original: don byed par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don byed par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not seen to perform a function.

original: don byed pa dang 'brel pa ni mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir mi slu bas ni don nyid la ma nges pa ma yin la /
analyzed: don byed pa dang 'brel pa ni mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir mi slu bas ni don nyid la ma nges pa ma yin la /
translated: Since the connection with the performance of a function is nondeceptive, a nondeceptive cognition is not uncertain about the object itself.

original: de nyid kyang de las nus pa can gyi ngo bo'i sgra rnams kyis brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyang de las nus pa can gyi ngo bo'i sgra rnams kyis brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, that is what is to be expressed by words that have the nature of being capable of expressing it.

original: bum pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i 'bras bu la /
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i 'bras bu la /
translated: A pot is said to be the result that is not accomplished by another entity.

original: bya ba byed pa'i ngo bo yin par brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: bya ba byed pa'i ngo bo yin par brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It is said to be the nature of the performance of an action.

original: de lta bu ni kun rdzob la yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu ni kun rdzob la yod pa ma yin la /
translated: But such a thing does not exist in the conventional.

original: rig byed la sogs pa'i rtogs bya ni de la nus pa med pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu yod pa yin du chug kyang de la don byed pa med pa'i phyir mi slu ba ma yin par ni mi rtogs pa yin zhing mi slu bas don nyid rtogs paüîΩyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rig byed la sogs pa'i rtogs bya ni de la nus pa med pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu yod pa yin du chug kyang de la don byed pa med pa'i phyir mi slu ba ma yin par ni mi rtogs pa yin zhing mi slu bas don nyid rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Because the objects of knowledge such as the Vedas are not capable of that, they are conventional realities. But it is not understood that they are not nondeceptive because they do not perform a function.üîΩNor is it understood that they are deceptive becauseüîΩthey are nondeceptive.

original: mi slu ba la yin yang kun rdzob tu yod pa rnams kyis don nyid ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ci las dgongs pa yang mi shes so //üîΩ'on te snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pa la sogs pa las de dag dang 'brel pa'am gzhan yang rung ste bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa las /
analyzed: mi slu ba la yin yang kun rdzob tu yod pa rnams kyis don nyid ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ci las dgongs pa yang mi shes so // 'on te snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pa la sogs pa las de dag dang 'brel pa'am gzhan yang rung ste bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa las /
translated: Nor is it understood what the meaning of such statements is.

original: tha snyad du mngon par brjod pas shes bzhin pa ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad du mngon par brjod pas shes bzhin pa ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
translated: But if they are related to the former and latter consciousnesses and so on, or if they are other, they are conventional realities because they are known through the expressions of conceptual consciousnesses that arise from latent potentialities.

original: de la yang 'brel pa can dag kho na de ma yin pa rnam par gcod par byed pa'i ngo bo'i nus pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir don nyid ma nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: de la yang 'brel pa can dag kho na de ma yin pa rnam par gcod par byed pa'i ngo bo'i nus pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir don nyid ma nyams pa yin no //
translated: In this regard, the very capacity of the related things to exclude what is not that is the capacity of the nature of things, and thus the meaning of ‚Äúexistence‚Äù is not lost.

original: tha snyad pa'i tshad ma dang gzhal bya yang rung ba ni skabs ma yin la /
analyzed: tha snyad pa'i tshad ma dang gzhal bya yang rung ba ni skabs ma yin la /
translated: Conventional valid knowledge and objects of comprehension are not appropriate in this context.

original: des na mi slu ba ni don nyid gsal bya ma yin pa ma yin no //üîΩ'on te gzugs la sogs pa rnams la yan lag can gcig tu 'dzin pa dang snga ma @99b phyi ma yang rung /
analyzed: des na mi slu ba ni don nyid gsal bya ma yin pa ma yin no // 'on te gzugs la sogs pa rnams la yan lag can gcig tu 'dzin pa dang snga ma @99b phyi ma yang rung /
translated: Thus, ‚Äúnondeceptive‚Äù does not clarify the meaning of ‚Äúexistence.‚Äù

original: gcig tu 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
translated: If you say that because forms and so on are apprehended as a single whole and as sequential, they exist conventionally,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de lta bu ni rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad la sogs pa bzhin du nus pa can ma yin pas kun rdzob 'ba' zhig nyid du yang yod par mi rigs pas so //
analyzed: de lta bu ni rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i skra shad la sogs pa bzhin du nus pa can ma yin pas kun rdzob 'ba' zhig nyid du yang yod par mi rigs pas so //
translated: Such things are not even suitable to exist as mere conventionalities because they are not efficacious, like the floaters seen by someone with diseased vision.

original: 'ba' zhig ni de ltar rtogs par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni de ltar rtogs par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: You cannot understand mere existence in that way.

original: des na yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that existence is not understood in that way,

original: zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: The same applies to the second month, etc.

original: de la yang rtogs par byed pa 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang rtogs par byed pa 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And there is no cognition of any kind in that case.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba yang don byed pa la 'ga' zhig gi rjes su rtogs pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba yang don byed pa la 'ga' zhig gi rjes su rtogs pa yin pa'am /
translated: And the so-called cognition is the cognition of the existence of something that performs a function,

original: de'i med pa rjes su rtogs pa yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i med pa rjes su rtogs pa yang rung ba'o //
translated: or the cognition of its nonexistence.

original: gang gi bya ba yin pa de yod pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi bya ba yin pa de yod pa yin la /
translated: That which is the object of the cognition exists.

original: gang zhig de lta ma yin pa de ni gzhan du yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig de lta ma yin pa de ni gzhan du yin no //
translated: That which is not so is otherwise.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya bas ni kun rdzob tu yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya bas ni kun rdzob tu yin te /
translated: The so-called cognition is conventional,

original: de de bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'i phyir kun rdzob yin la /
analyzed: de de bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'i phyir kun rdzob yin la /
translated: because it is the cognition of that as it is, it is conventional.

original: rang yang dag par rig pa tsam du rtogs par bya ba ni don dam pa pa yin zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
analyzed: rang yang dag par rig pa tsam du rtogs par bya ba ni don dam pa pa yin zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
translated: The object of cognition as mere correct knowledge is ultimate.

original: gang gi phyir bum pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bum pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: The cognition of a pot, etc.

original: gcig pa nyid la sogs pa la slu ba can yin la /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid la sogs pa la slu ba can yin la /
translated: is deceptive with regard to unity, etc.

original: de'i don byed pa'i byed pa po nyid la sogs pa la ni mi slu bas tshad ma nyid yin zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i don byed pa'i byed pa po nyid la sogs pa la ni mi slu bas tshad ma nyid yin zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that the one who is the agent of that action is valid because it is nondeceptive. This is the assertion of others.

original: rang gi 'dod pa nyid du ni de lta bu'i tshad ma nyid rang dbang yin pa ni don dam pa la ltos nas yin la /
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa nyid du ni de lta bu'i tshad ma nyid rang dbang yin pa ni don dam pa la ltos nas yin la /
translated: But in our own assertion, such valid knowledge is independent in reliance on the ultimate.

original: de la ni don nyid rtogs pa la ltos par bya ba cung zad kyang med pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ni don nyid rtogs pa la ltos par bya ba cung zad kyang med pa yin te /
translated: And in that, the meaning itself is not in the least dependent on being realized.

original: rang yang dag par rig pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang yang dag par rig pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established as one‚Äôs own correct knowledge.üîΩIn the Vedas and so on, such valid knowledge is not compatible.

original: rig byed la sogs pa la ni de lta bu'i tshad ma nyid rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rig byed la sogs pa la ni de lta bu'i tshad ma nyid rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: And that is stated:

original: de yang / don gang blo la gsal ba ni //
analyzed: de yang / don gang blo la gsal ba ni //
translated: The meaning that is clear to the mind

original: de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid //
translated: is the valid knowledge of words.

original: ces gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: yang na 'dir don gyi sgras ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: yang na 'dir don gyi sgras ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Or here, the meaning of the words is stated:

original: gsal byed ces bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis lkog tu gyur pa ma yin zhes bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: gsal byed ces bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis lkog tu gyur pa ma yin zhes bstan pa yin la /
translated: The term ‚Äúrevealer‚Äù indicates that it is not hidden by the nature of experience.

original: des kyang rang bzhin dang rgyu'i dngos po nyid 'dzin par byed pa'i bdag nyid dang / 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyang bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: des kyang rang bzhin dang rgyu'i dngos po nyid 'dzin par byed pa'i bdag nyid dang / 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyang bkag pa yin no //
translated: It also refutes the nature of grasping at the entity of cause and nature, as well as the nature of grasping.

original: ma shes pa zhes bya ba ni gzung bya nyid do //üîΩgzung bya nyid @100a * //
analyzed: ma shes pa zhes bya ba ni gzung bya nyid do // gzung bya nyid @100a * //
translated: ‚ÄúNot known‚Äù means the object of grasping.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba yin yang gcig pu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba yin yang gcig pu ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of grasping‚Äù and so on are free from being one,

original: rgya che ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgya che ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is observed as vast.

original: yul tha dad pa la dmigs pa ni gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa la dmigs pa ni gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not one because it is observed as a different object.

original: yul gyi dbye bas 'gal ba'i chos dang 'dre ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gyi dbye bas 'gal ba'i chos dang 'dre ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is mixed with contradictory phenomena due to the division of objects.

original: du ma yang ma yin te /
analyzed: du ma yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not many,

original: yang mi dmigs pa rjes su dpag pas rdul phra rab kyi ngo bor yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang mi dmigs pa rjes su dpag pas rdul phra rab kyi ngo bor yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not observed as the nature of atoms through inference.

original: ji snyed dmigs pa de snyed pa yul tha dad pa yin pas /
analyzed: ji snyed dmigs pa de snyed pa yul tha dad pa yin pas /
translated: As much as it is observed, it is as many different objects.

original: gcig pa'am du ma nyid ni cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa de nyid kyis na de'i dgag pa yang med pas dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rtog pa zad pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba gcig gi yin
analyzed: gcig pa'am du ma nyid ni cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa de nyid kyis na de'i dgag pa yang med pas dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rtog pa zad pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba gcig gi yin
translated: Because there is not the slightest bit of singularity or multiplicity, and because there is no negation of that non-entity, the exhaustion of the concepts of entity and non-entity is nirvana.

original: no // de la don zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: no // de la don zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: gang gi phyir shes pa ni rang rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid kyis de'i bye brag can yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa ni rang rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid kyis de'i bye brag can yin gyi /
translated: Because cognition is included within self-awareness, it is a particular of that.

original: yul gyi dbye bas 'byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yul gyi dbye bas 'byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not distinguished by the distinction of objects,

original: yul yang de'i bye brag can yin pas tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul yang de'i bye brag can yin pas tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because the object is also a particular of that, and there is no difference. This is the meaning.

original: de'i phyir shes pa ni tshad ma nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa ni tshad ma nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, cognition is valid cognition,

original: mi slu ba can nyid dang ma shes pa'i don rig pa can nyid dang / rang yang dag par rig pa yang rung mthong ba dang cig shos la dgos pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba can nyid dang ma shes pa'i don rig pa can nyid dang / rang yang dag par rig pa yang rung mthong ba dang cig shos la dgos pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is non-deceptive, because it cognizes an unknown object, and because it is self-awareness, or because it is purposeful in seeing and the opposite.

original: rtogs par byed pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the cause of the understanding of the object,

original: tshad ma ma yin pa dang cig shos la thun mong ba nyid yin pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa dang cig shos la thun mong ba nyid yin pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not a means of valid knowledge and because it is common to both the valid and the invalid.

original: gnod pa med pa nyid ni mi slu ba can nyid kho na yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa nyid ni mi slu ba can nyid kho na yin te /
translated: Nondeceptiveness is the same as nonerroneousness.

original: gzhan la ni mi srid pa nyid dang / dgos pa med pa can nyid du bstan pa la gtod pa yin par shes par bya'o //üîΩde lta yin na ni mthong ba las ma shes pa ni snang bzhin pa na mthong ba nyid dam /
analyzed: gzhan la ni mi srid pa nyid dang / dgos pa med pa can nyid du bstan pa la gtod pa yin par shes par bya'o // de lta yin na ni mthong ba las ma shes pa ni snang bzhin pa na mthong ba nyid dam /
translated: It should be understood that the other two are taught in order to show that the other two are impossible and purposeless.

original: phyi rol nyid la yang de nyid 'di yin no zhes sngar mthong ba ngo shes pas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol nyid la yang de nyid 'di yin no zhes sngar mthong ba ngo shes pas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: If that is so, then what is not understood from seeing is understood from recognition, which is the recognition of what was seen before, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is that very thing,‚Äù when it is present.

analyzed: shes pa nyid ni tshad ma yin te /

original: zhes bya ba'i dri ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i dri ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyis sgrub par byed pa yin no //

original: 'u bu cag la sogs pa rnams kyi yang shes pa ni shes bya yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa yin par ci las shes pa yin /

original: de ni shes bya las skyes pa'am shes bya'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni shes bya las skyes pa'am shes bya'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin no //

original: 'o na ci zhe na /

analyzed: shes bya'i bya ba las 'dzin par byed pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa ni ;

original: gal te shes bya mi rtag pas //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te shes bya mi rtag pas // zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: skye bzhin pa ni gzhan las yin pa ji lta ba kho na bzhin du bya ba byed pa po yang yin par bstan pa ni /

analyzed: shes bya'i rang bzhin la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'o //

original: de la gal te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de la gal te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In that regard, if it is said,

analyzed: shes pa ni shes bya med na bya ba med pa yin la /

original: de yod kyang de'i ngo bo yin na ji ltar 'dzin byed yin /
analyzed: de yod kyang de'i ngo bo yin na ji ltar 'dzin byed yin /
translated: But if it exists, if it has the nature of that, how can it be the apprehender?

analyzed: des na shes bya dang bral ba bya ba byed pa po ma yin pa las shes bya'i dus su bya ba byed pa ni gzhan yin na //
translated: Therefore, the agent of activity at the time of the object of knowledge is not the one who is devoid of the object of knowledge.

analyzed: gzugs brnyan yod pa dang cig shos kyi dus dag gu de'i bye brag tu yod pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The reflection is not present at the time when the other is present.

original: 'on te de ni me long gi / zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te de ni me long gi / zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if it is like a mirror,

original: de lta yin na thams cad du 'gro ba de'i shes bya thams cad la nye ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na thams cad du 'gro ba de'i shes bya thams cad la nye ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'on te thams cad du 'gro ba yin yang mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pa ltos nas yin te /

original: de ni yul nges pa yin pa'i phyir nges pa 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni yul nges pa yin pa'i phyir nges pa 'dzin pa yin no //

original: dang por nges pa ma yin pa ni de nye ba las nges pa can du mi 'gyur te rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang por nges pa ma yin pa ni de nye ba las nges pa can du mi 'gyur te rtag pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gzhan pa de ni de las 'byung ba yin par ni rigs so zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /

analyzed: 'o na ni rang gi tshogs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If that is so, then it is said, ‚Äúfrom its own collection.‚Äù

original: rang gi tshogs pa las te mig la sogs pa las de ltar te /
analyzed: rang gi tshogs pa las te mig la sogs pa las de ltar te /
translated: From its own collection, from the eye and so on, it is like that.

analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo ni de nyid la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis mig la sogs pa nyid kyi nus pa las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ji ltar mig gi bya ba med pa yin yang don rtogs pa nyid ni de la ltos pa yin pa de bzhin du shes pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Just as the object is understood even when the eye is not functioning, it is dependent on that, and so it is with consciousness.

original: 'on te mig mi 'gul bar phye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te mig mi 'gul bar phye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: If it is said that the eye is open without moving,

original: shes pa nyid ni bya ba gzhan med kyang rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i nus pa can du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa nyid ni bya ba gzhan med kyang rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i nus pa can du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: consciousness itself is understood to have the capacity of agreement and so on, even without another function.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: de la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no reversal of that.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa yin no zhes na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yod pa yin no zhes na /
translated: If you say that there is concomitance,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then no,

original: de med na gzhan yod kyang mi 'byung zhes bya bar mi 'grub na /
analyzed: de med na gzhan yod kyang mi 'byung zhes bya bar mi 'grub na /
translated: because if it is not established that when that does not exist, the other does not occur,üîΩthen the capacity for concomitance is not understood.

original: de'i rjes su 'gron ba'i nus pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes lan du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'gron ba'i nus pa mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes lan du bstan pa ni /
translated: The response is:

original: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From concomitance and reversal,

original: de'i phyir dbang phyug la yang don gyi shes pa ni de'i mig la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang phyug la yang don gyi shes pa ni de'i mig la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin gyi /

analyzed: de las gzhan pa rtag pa rtogs pa'i ngo bo ni bskyed bya ma yin par nye bar bsdu ba ni /

analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ba de ni don nyid yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, in that case, that is the object itself.

original: mig la sogs pa las byung ba'i don rtogs pa nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa yin pa ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa las byung ba'i don rtogs pa nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa yin pa ni bden mod kyi /
translated: It is true that the cognition of an object that arises from the eyes and so on is the apprehender because it is not different from that.

original: de yang rtogs pa nyid bzhin du de dang yang rtag pa dang 'brel pa can nyid yin no //üîΩde'i phyir des kyang 'dzin @105a * //
analyzed: de yang rtogs pa nyid bzhin du de dang yang rtag pa dang 'brel pa can nyid yin no // de'i phyir des kyang 'dzin @105a * //
translated: Moreover, just like the cognition, it is also related to the object.

original: pa yin gyi /
analyzed: pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is also the apprehender of the object.

original: phrad pa dang de'i bdag nyid dag la bye brag ci yang med do snyam du sems pa ni /üîΩ'on te don de tshad ma yin mod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: phrad pa dang de'i bdag nyid dag la bye brag ci yang med do snyam du sems pa ni / 'on te don de tshad ma yin mod ces bya ba ste /
translated: What is the difference between contact and identity?üîΩIf you think that the object is a valid cognition,

original: re zhig don ni rtogs pa nyid dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir don gyi 'dzin pa por 'gyur la /
analyzed: re zhig don ni rtogs pa nyid dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir don gyi 'dzin pa por 'gyur la /
translated: then the object is not different from the cognition itself, so the object becomes the apprehender of the object.

original: phan pa mi byed pa gzhan ni nye ba tsam gyis nam mkha' bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phan pa mi byed pa gzhan ni nye ba tsam gyis nam mkha' bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that other things that do not provide benefit are not the apprehender of the object merely by being present, like space.

original: 'brel pa ni phan par byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa ni phan par byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: A relation is the provision of benefit.

original: phan pa ni mkho ba'o //üîΩnye ba yin par bye brag med kyang don de nye bar ston pa yin gyi /
analyzed: phan pa ni mkho ba'o // nye ba yin par bye brag med kyang don de nye bar ston pa yin gyi /
translated: Benefit is a need.üîΩAlthough there is no difference in being present, the object is presented as present by that.

analyzed: mar me'i rang bzhin gang kho nas bya ba gcig byed pa kho nas gzhan yin no zhes ltos pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the nature of a lamp is such that it performs a single action and it is not tenable to say that it is different because it is related to another action.

original: yul tha dad pa la du mar 'dzin pa ltar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa la du mar 'dzin pa ltar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you think that it is like the apprehension of many things in different places,

original: mthong ba'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: mthong ba'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: then there is no error because it is seen.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi sdod pa la mar mi la sogs pa la mthong ba'i phyir brtag par mi @108b bya'o ;
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi sdod pa la mar mi la sogs pa la mthong ba'i phyir brtag par mi @108b bya'o ;
translated: It is not to be imagined that the nature of a lamp is such that it remains in one place and is seen in another.

original: / yang na sgra las byung ba'i tshad ma ni rtag par rig pa'i bdag nyid du yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: / yang na sgra las byung ba'i tshad ma ni rtag par rig pa'i bdag nyid du yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Or, is it not the case that the valid knowledge that arises from words has the nature of being permanent?

original: rang bzhin gzhan ni shed bu la sogs pa bzhin du /
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan ni shed bu la sogs pa bzhin du /
translated: The other nature is like the son of a barren woman.

original: de 'am de'i don las yang dran pa por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'am de'i don las yang dran pa por 'gyur ro //
translated: It is remembered as that or the meaning of that.

original: ji skad du mthong ba'i don ni gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad du mthong ba'i don ni gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: The meaning that is seen is not another, so it is not imagined.

original: gnas skabs kha cig tu 'tshed par byos zhes bya ba'i sgra dmigs nas de'i rang gi ngo bo la gos pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang ldan pa nye ba la 'bras bu med pa de'i yan lag yin zhes rigs pa'i phyir dang / rung ba'i phyir 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i tha snyad kyi yan lag gi don rtogs par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gnas skabs kha cig tu 'tshed par byos zhes bya ba'i sgra dmigs nas de'i rang gi ngo bo la gos pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang ldan pa nye ba la 'bras bu med pa de'i yan lag yin zhes rigs pa'i phyir dang / rung ba'i phyir 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i tha snyad kyi yan lag gi don rtogs par byed pa yin la /
translated: When the word ‚Äúcook‚Äù is observed in some context, since its nature is not obscured, it is reasonable that the meaning of the word ‚Äúcook‚Äù is the one who possesses the result, and the one who is near to possessing the result is a part of that.

original: sgra dang de'i yan lag dang yan lag can nyid du go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang de'i yan lag dang yan lag can nyid du go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The word and its parts are understood as parts and whole.

original: 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa'i yan lag nyid la /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa'i yan lag nyid la /
translated: The parts that cause the understanding of the meaning that is a part of the expression of the one who possesses the resultüîΩare the parts of the word.

original: sgra 'bras bu med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: sgra 'bras bu med pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the word itself is without result,üîΩthen it is not a part of the expression of the one who possesses the result.

original: rung ba nyid du go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba nyid du go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a means of understanding the suitability of the expression.

original: don rtogs pa'i rigs pas grub pa'i yan lag nyid kyis rtag pa nyid khyab par byed pa yin par rnam par gzhag pa na /
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i rigs pas grub pa'i yan lag nyid kyis rtag pa nyid khyab par byed pa yin par rnam par gzhag pa na /
translated: When it is established that the quality of being a means of understanding the meaning entails the quality of being permanent,

original: mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba can yin pa'i phyir gnod pa can no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba can yin pa'i phyir gnod pa can no //
translated: it is a means of refuting because it is contradictory to the quality of being impermanent.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la ni sgra don rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la ni sgra don rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
translated: The quality of being impermanent is not a means of understanding the meaning of a word.

original: 'brel pa ma bzung bas ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'brel pa ma bzung bas ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because it is not grasped when the relation is grasped.

original: /'di 'di'i brjod bya yin zhes bya bar bzung nas /
analyzed: /'di 'di'i brjod bya yin zhes bya bar bzung nas /
translated: When one grasps that this is the object of expression of that,üîΩone understands it by following that,

original: de nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par byed pa'am /üîΩrtogs par byed pa la 'dzud pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par byed pa'am / rtogs par byed pa la 'dzud pa yin la /
translated: or one is led to understand it.

original: de ltar na rtag pa nyid kho na /
analyzed: de ltar na rtag pa nyid kho na /
translated: In that case, only the quality of being permanentüîΩis a means of understanding the meaning of a word.

original: don 'brel pa mthong na rjod byed //
analyzed: don 'brel pa mthong na rjod byed //
translated: If one sees the relation of the meaning to the word,

original: nus ldan mi 'gyur de lta na //
analyzed: nus ldan mi 'gyur de lta na //
translated: the word will not be able to express the meaning.

original: snga na med pa'ang der 'gyur te ;
analyzed: snga na med pa'ang der 'gyur te ;
translated: If it were so, then even that which did not exist previouslyüîΩwould be the object of expression.

original: / kun yang kun la gsal byed 'gyur //
analyzed: / kun yang kun la gsal byed 'gyur //
translated: And everything would be the object of expression of everything.

original: gsal ba nyid ni nye ba tsam gyis gsal bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid ni nye ba tsam gyis gsal bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If the quality of being manifest were to manifest merely by being present,

original: mi rtag pa la yang 'gal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la yang 'gal ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not contradictory for the impermanent to be a sign of the impermanent.

original: mi ni mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir de nyid la yang gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ni mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir de nyid la yang gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: A man is a perceptible object, but it is not a clarifier of itself.

original: du ba bzhin du sgra yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: du ba bzhin du sgra yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Sound is a clarifier, like smoke.

original: bden te / 'brel pa 'dzin pa nyid yin na 'gyur la /
analyzed: bden te / 'brel pa 'dzin pa nyid yin na 'gyur la /
translated: It is true that it is a clarifier if it apprehends a connection.

original: du ba'i 'brel pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yin no //
analyzed: du ba'i 'brel pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yin no //
translated: The connection of smoke is the pervasion and the counter pervasion.

original: sgra ni de dag nyid dang bral ba'i go byed nyid yin te me lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgra ni de dag nyid dang bral ba'i go byed nyid yin te me lta bu'o //
translated: Sound is a clarifier by means of those two, like fire.

original: sgra la ni de rang 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra la ni de rang 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig la ltos pa yin la /
translated: Sound is only dependent on itself as the apprehender.

original: me ni de lta ma yin @109a * //
analyzed: me ni de lta ma yin @109a * //
translated: Fire is not like that.

original: zhes bya ba'i bye brag mthong ba nyid kyi phyir cung zad kyang gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bye brag mthong ba nyid kyi phyir cung zad kyang gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Since we see the difference, there is no contradiction at all.

original: mi rtag pa la ni de 'dzin pa mi srid do //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la ni de 'dzin pa mi srid do //
translated: It is impossible for the impermanent to apprehend the impermanent.

original: lan gnyis gsum du ma mthong ba ni mthong ba tsam las 'brel pa can nyid go bar byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lan gnyis gsum du ma mthong ba ni mthong ba tsam las 'brel pa can nyid go bar byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one does not see it two or three times, it is not a clarifier of the connection merely from seeing it.

original: skad cig ma nyid la ni sgras de bzhin du rtogs pa mi srid do //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la ni sgras de bzhin du rtogs pa mi srid do //
translated: But it is impossible for a sound to be understood in a single moment.

original: don ldan sngar mthong yin zhe na //
analyzed: don ldan sngar mthong yin zhe na //
translated: If you say that the meaning is understood from the previously seen word,

original: de ni de tsam long yod min //
analyzed: de ni de tsam long yod min //
translated: that is not possible, because the word is not present at the time of the meaning.

original: lan gnyis lan gsum ma mthong ba //
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum ma mthong ba //
translated: If the meaning is not understood from the word seen twice or thrice,

original: don dang ldan par rtogs pa min //
analyzed: don dang ldan par rtogs pa min //
translated: it is not understood as related to the meaning.

original: rtag pa'i phyogs la yang mthong ba ni rang gi dus tsam yul yin pas ther zug pa nyid du mi rtogs pa'i phyir ji ltar 'brel pa 'dzin par 'gyur /
analyzed: rtag pa'i phyogs la yang mthong ba ni rang gi dus tsam yul yin pas ther zug pa nyid du mi rtogs pa'i phyir ji ltar 'brel pa 'dzin par 'gyur /
translated: And in the case of a permanent word, since it is perceived only at the time of the meaning, it is not understood as eternal, so how can it be grasped as related?

original: yang dang yang du mthong ba yin na de'i shugs kyis 'di 'di dang lhan cig par nges pa'am /
analyzed: yang dang yang du mthong ba yin na de'i shugs kyis 'di 'di dang lhan cig par nges pa'am /
translated: If it is perceived again and again, then by implication it is ascertained that this is related to that, or

original: 'di 'di'i rjod byed yin zhes bya bar yang 'gyur bar shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di 'di'i rjod byed yin zhes bya bar yang 'gyur bar shes pa'o //
translated: it is known that this is the expression of that.

original: 'di la yang kha cig mngon sum du 'dod la /
analyzed: 'di la yang kha cig mngon sum du 'dod la /
translated: Here, some assert that this is direct perception,

original: gzhan dag ni don gyis go bar 'dod do ;
analyzed: gzhan dag ni don gyis go bar 'dod do ;
translated: while others assert that it is understood by implication.

original: / shes pa 'di la yang nges bya nges byed dam brjod bya rjod byed du yang dus dang yul dag las ma nges par rtogs pa yin pas rtag par brjod do //
analyzed: / shes pa 'di la yang nges bya nges byed dam brjod bya rjod byed du yang dus dang yul dag las ma nges par rtogs pa yin pas rtag par brjod do //
translated: This knowledge is also said to be permanent because it is understood that it is not limited in time and place, as is the case with the knower and the known, or the speaker and the spoken.üîΩ

original: gang zhig / dus dang yul la sogs pa las //
analyzed: gang zhig / dus dang yul la sogs pa las //
translated: This cognition is also said to be permanent because it is understood to be indeterminate with respect to time and place, in terms of the object of determination and the means of determination, or the object of expression and the means of expression.üîΩSomeone might say:

original: ma nges pa yi dngos yod pa //üîΩde ni rtag dang khyab bdag 'dod //
analyzed: ma nges pa yi dngos yod pa // de ni rtag dang khyab bdag 'dod //
translated: An entity that is indeterminateüîΩwith respect to time, place, and so onüîΩis asserted to be permanent and all-pervading.

original: bdag ni khyab bdag nyid du brjod //
analyzed: bdag ni khyab bdag nyid du brjod //
translated: The self is said to be all-pervading.

original: ces gang smos pa'o //
analyzed: ces gang smos pa'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: mthong ba ni nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyir phyin ci log tu rtogs pa'i gnod pas sgra tsam las nges par gnas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ni nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyir phyin ci log tu rtogs pa'i gnod pas sgra tsam las nges par gnas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Since seeing engages with the determinate, it is not the case that one remains determinate on the basis of mere words, due to the harm of understanding things in a distorted way.

original: yongs su bcad pa ni gdong gi ring ba nyid la sogs pa bzhin du gsal bar byed pa'i chos su gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: yongs su bcad pa ni gdong gi ring ba nyid la sogs pa bzhin du gsal bar byed pa'i chos su gnas pa yin te /
translated: The determination is like the clarity of the length of the face and so on.

original: gsal byed sgra la rag las phyir //
analyzed: gsal byed sgra la rag las phyir //
translated: Because it depends on the expressive sound,

original: de yi yul la 'dzin byed de //
analyzed: de yi yul la 'dzin byed de //
translated: it apprehends its object.

original: sgra rnams kyis ni nus pa min //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyis ni nus pa min //
translated: The sounds do not have the ability

original: nam mkha' bar mtshams med khyab min //
analyzed: nam mkha' bar mtshams med khyab min //
translated: to pervade the space without interstices.

original: de phyir ma bcad dngos nyid kyis //
analyzed: de phyir ma bcad dngos nyid kyis //
translated: Therefore, the entity itself is not cut off.

original: 'di ni gzhan du rtogs byed min //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan du rtogs byed min //
translated: It is not understood in any other way.

original: 'di mthong ba yang gcig yin pa yang thag ring ba nyid dang / khyab nyid la sogs pa'i dbang gis nyi ma bzhin du yul sna tshogs par mthong bar shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di mthong ba yang gcig yin pa yang thag ring ba nyid dang / khyab nyid la sogs pa'i dbang gis nyi ma bzhin du yul sna tshogs par mthong bar shes pa yin no //
translated: And when it is seen, it is seen in various places, like the sun, because of the distance, the extent, etc.

original: gang gi tshe skyes bu gcig shar du bltas pas nyi ma mthong ba de'i tshe lho phyogs nyid na gnas pas kyang rang las bltas par mthong la de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyis @109b kyang yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe skyes bu gcig shar du bltas pas nyi ma mthong ba de'i tshe lho phyogs nyid na gnas pas kyang rang las bltas par mthong la de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyis @109b kyang yin gyi /
translated: When one person in the east sees the sun, then the person in the south sees it as being to his south, and so on for all the other directions.

original: gnyis su mthong ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis su mthong ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not seen as two.

original: de'i gcig nyid yul sna tshogs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i gcig nyid yul sna tshogs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: So it is understood that the sun is one, but has various aspects.

original: ji ltar yang lha sbyin rim gyis yul sna tshogs par phyin kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar yang lha sbyin rim gyis yul sna tshogs par phyin kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And just as Devadatta, though he goes to various places, is not different,

original: de bzhin du sgra yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra yang ngo //
translated: so it is with sound.

original: 'di ci bzhin du shes pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ci bzhin du shes pa ni //
translated: The cognition is like the sun.

original: gcig nyid yang dang yang mthong ba //
analyzed: gcig nyid yang dang yang mthong ba //
translated: The one is seen again and again.

original: dus kyi dbye bas tha dad min //
analyzed: dus kyi dbye bas tha dad min //
translated: It is not different because of the difference in time.

original: de bzhin sgra ni yul las min //
analyzed: de bzhin sgra ni yul las min //
translated: Likewise, sound is not from the object.

original: 'di'i gcig pa nyid du bsre ba ni spyi'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i gcig pa nyid du bsre ba ni spyi'i yul ma yin te /
translated: The mixing of this as one is not the object of the universal because,

original: cha shas med pa nyid kyis gong bu las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha shas med pa nyid kyis gong bu las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: being partless, it is not different from the whole.

original: de'i phyir spyi'i shes pa yin yang gong bu yul nyid yin no //üîΩdes na ba lang gi sgra chen po'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi'i shes pa yin yang gong bu yul nyid yin no // des na ba lang gi sgra chen po'am /
translated: Therefore, even though it is the cognition of the universal, the whole is the object.üîΩThus, the sound of a great or small cow is also great or small because it is manifested as great or small.

original: chung ngu yang zhes bya bas chen po dang chung ngu yin pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa'i shes pa yang chen po dang chung du nyid kho nar gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: chung ngu yang zhes bya bas chen po dang chung ngu yin pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa'i shes pa yang chen po dang chung du nyid kho nar gnas pa yin la /
translated: The cognition of the manifestation also exists as great or small.

original: gling bu dang rdza rnga la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i sgra rnams chen po la sogs par mthong ba yang yin no ;
analyzed: gling bu dang rdza rnga la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa'i sgra rnams chen po la sogs par mthong ba yang yin no ;
translated: The sounds that manifest a flute, a drum, and so on are also seen as great and so on.

original: / sgra de rnams ni sgra nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: / sgra de rnams ni sgra nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
translated: Some say that those sounds are sound itself.

original: yi ge dang yi ge ma yin pa'i bdag nyid kyis sgra ni rnam pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yi ge dang yi ge ma yin pa'i bdag nyid kyis sgra ni rnam pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Sound is twofold because of the nature of letters and nonletters.

original: rkan la sogs pa rlung rnams kyis nye bar bskyod pa las yi ge bdag nyid du mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin te /üîΩnye bar bskyod pa ni gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rkan la sogs pa rlung rnams kyis nye bar bskyod pa las yi ge bdag nyid du mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin te / nye bar bskyod pa ni gzhan yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams kyi'o //
translated: The letters are manifested by the winds that move the palate, etc.üîΩThe winds that move the palate, etc., are different from the winds that manifest the letters.

original: gzhan dag ni rlung rnams nyid gnas nye bar bskyod pa dang / nye bar bskyod pa ma yin pa dag gis yi ge dang yi ge ma yin pa dag tu mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni gsal pa dang mi gsal ba'i sgra gsal ba yin par smra'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rlung rnams nyid gnas nye bar bskyod pa dang / nye bar bskyod pa ma yin pa dag gis yi ge dang yi ge ma yin pa dag tu mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni gsal pa dang mi gsal ba'i sgra gsal ba yin par smra'o //
translated: Others say that the winds themselves, by moving or not moving the places, manifest the letters or non-letters, and that the manifestation of the clear or unclear sounds is the manifestation of the letters.

original: de yang yan lag dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir chen po nyid la sogs pa dang 'brel pa can rnams gsal bar byed pa la blo de skyed par byed pa yin no //üîΩsgra rnams rna bas go byed par //
analyzed: de yang yan lag dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir chen po nyid la sogs pa dang 'brel pa can rnams gsal bar byed pa la blo de skyed par byed pa yin no // sgra rnams rna bas go byed par //
translated: Since that is also accompanied by its parts, the mind that produces the manifestation of the sounds related to the great elements, etc., is produced.üîΩSome say that sound is heard by the ear,

original: kha cig smra ste de yi phyir //üîΩde rnams rlung gis bskul ba nyid //
analyzed: kha cig smra ste de yi phyir // de rnams rlung gis bskul ba nyid //
translated: and thereforeüîΩthe ear is well-trained

original: rna ba legs par sbyangs pa yin //
analyzed: rna ba legs par sbyangs pa yin //
translated: by the winds that move the palate, etc.

original: rnga pa ta ha la sogs pa rnams la dbyig pa la sogs pas mngon par bsnun pa'i rlung gis bskul bas /
analyzed: rnga pa ta ha la sogs pa rnams la dbyig pa la sogs pas mngon par bsnun pa'i rlung gis bskul bas /
translated: The wind that is impelled by the striking of the drum, the pa·π≠aha, and so on, with sticks and so forth,

original: rna ba'i yul du 'ongs pa rnams de legs par sbyangs pa las bdag nyid 'dzin par byed du 'jug pa ni rkan la sogs pa bskyod pa med pa'i phyir yi ge'i bdag nyid kho na thos pa yin @110a * //
analyzed: rna ba'i yul du 'ongs pa rnams de legs par sbyangs pa las bdag nyid 'dzin par byed du 'jug pa ni rkan la sogs pa bskyod pa med pa'i phyir yi ge'i bdag nyid kho na thos pa yin @110a * //
translated: having come into the domain of the ear, causes one to understand the sounds that are well-trained in them. The nature of the letters is heard alone, because the palate and so on are not moved.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: des nye bar bskyod pa ni yi ger mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: des nye bar bskyod pa ni yi ger mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin te /
translated: That which is impelled by them is the manifestation of the letters.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: And on that,üîΩit is said:

original: yi ge gsal ba mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: yi ge gsal ba mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because the manifestation of the letters is seen,

original: de rnams ma mthong bar brtag min //üîΩzhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams ma mthong bar brtag min // zhes smos pa'o //
translated: they cannot be imagined as unseen.

original: yang 'dod pa gzhan bstan pa ni //üîΩrkan sogs phrad dang dbye ba yi //
analyzed: yang 'dod pa gzhan bstan pa ni // rkan sogs phrad dang dbye ba yi //
translated: Again, another assertion is taught:üîΩOthers assert that the manifestation of the lettersüîΩis due to the impulsion of the contact and separation

original: bskul bas gsal ba yi ge ni //üîΩgsal byed yin 'dod gzhan dag ni //
analyzed: bskul bas gsal ba yi ge ni // gsal byed yin 'dod gzhan dag ni //
translated: of the palate and so on,

original: sgra nyid kun dang 'brel 'dod pa //
analyzed: sgra nyid kun dang 'brel 'dod pa //
translated: and that the consonants are related to all sounds.

original: de phyir yul la sogs pa tha dad pa dang / chen po dang chung ngu nyid la sogs pa yang bor nas sgra tsam la dmigs bzhin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la ni bsnyon par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de phyir yul la sogs pa tha dad pa dang / chen po dang chung ngu nyid la sogs pa yang bor nas sgra tsam la dmigs bzhin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la ni bsnyon par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not proper to deny that a conceptual cognition apprehends sound alone, even though it has abandoned the differences of object, etc., and the differences of large and small, etc.

original: de la bsnyon par byed pa yin na ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la bsnyon par byed pa yin na ni rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you deny that, then it follows, absurdly, that there would be no inference, etc.

original: gang gi phyir de med na khyab pa 'dzin pa med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de med na khyab pa 'dzin pa med do //
translated: Because if that were not so, then there would be no apprehension of pervasion.

original: phyogs 'ga' na yod par mthong ba ni khyab pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs 'ga' na yod par mthong ba ni khyab pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Seeing something as existing in some places is not the apprehension of pervasion,

original: khyab pa ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the pervasion is the opposite of that.

original: gong bu rnams kho na rnam par rtog pa des rnam par ma bcad pas rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gong bu rnams kho na rnam par rtog pa des rnam par ma bcad pas rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the conceptual cognition apprehends the aggregates without having eliminated them.

original: de rnams kyi de ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na 'khrul par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi de ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na 'khrul par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if they were not its nature, then it would follow, absurdly, that it was mistaken.

original: gnod pa can med pa las ni 'khrul pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir rnam par bcad pa de rnams kyi rnam par bcad pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: gnod pa can med pa las ni 'khrul pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir rnam par bcad pa de rnams kyi rnam par bcad pa med pa yin la /
translated: Since error is not established from the absence of a fault, the exclusion of those is not an exclusion.

original: des na 'khrul pa ma yin no //üîΩde lta yin na sgra'i rtag pa nyid dang khyab bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa ma yin no // de lta yin na sgra'i rtag pa nyid dang khyab bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Therefore, it is not error.üîΩIf that is so, then sound would be permanent and all-pervading.

original: tshad ma rtag pa zhes smos pa ni sgra'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: tshad ma rtag pa zhes smos pa ni sgra'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúpermanent valid cognition‚Äù refers to the nature of sound.

original: nyid yod min ni nye bar ma dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: nyid yod min ni nye bar ma dmigs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDoes not exist‚Äù refers to non-observation.

original: ba lang gi sgra ni re re la brjod par tha dad nyid du nye bar dmigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra ni re re la brjod par tha dad nyid du nye bar dmigs pa yin gyi /
translated: The sound of a cow is observed as distinct in each individual.

original: nye bar dmigs pa la rnam par rtog pas gnod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa la rnam par rtog pas gnod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not the case that non-observation is undermined by conception,

original: dngos po yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a thing is not the object of conception.

original: dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: A thing is not the object of conception,

original: yid tsam gyi la thu rnams ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid tsam gyi la thu rnams ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because mental fabrications are not things.

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas de yul yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas de yul yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the object of conception because it is conceived by seeing,

original: de lta na de'i yang mthong ba nyid nye bar dmigs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i dbang gis rnam par rtog pa can gyi tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na de'i yang mthong ba nyid nye bar dmigs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i dbang gis rnam par rtog pa can gyi tshad ma yin no //
translated: In that case, since the seeing itself is the apprehender of that, it is a conceptual valid cognition due to seeing.

original: de yag blta bya so sor snang bas khyab par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yag blta bya so sor snang bas khyab par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the seeing pervades the object of seeing.

original: 'on kyang zhen pas ni @110b ma yin ni //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhen pas ni @110b ma yin ni //
translated: But it is not by way of conception.

original: mthong ba ni so sor snang ba yin la /
analyzed: mthong ba ni so sor snang ba yin la /
translated: Seeing is the appearance of something.

original: de ni gang yang so sor snang bas 'dzin pa yin gyi nges pas ni ma yin no //üîΩnges pa rnams kyis ma nges pa //
analyzed: de ni gang yang so sor snang bas 'dzin pa yin gyi nges pas ni ma yin no // nges pa rnams kyis ma nges pa //
translated: That is apprehended by the appearance of something, but not by conception.üîΩHow can the non-conceptual

original: de ni ji ltar de dag yul //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar de dag yul //
translated: be the object of the conceptual?

original: de'i phyir de lta bu'i don gyi ngo bo 'dzin par mthong ba la ni de dang mi 'dra ba'i rnam par rtog pas gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bu'i don gyi ngo bo 'dzin par mthong ba la ni de dang mi 'dra ba'i rnam par rtog pas gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in seeing that apprehends the nature of an object like that, it is not harmed by a conception that is unlike it.

original: gnod pa yin yang dngos po spangs nas blang bya la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pas 'gro ba rnams 'jug pa dang ldog pa mi byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod pa yin yang dngos po spangs nas blang bya la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pas 'gro ba rnams 'jug pa dang ldog pa mi byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it were harmed, since there would be no distinction of accepting and rejecting by abandoning and adopting things, beings would not engage in and disengage from actions.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni dngos po mthong ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni dngos po mthong ba can ma yin te /
translated: Conceptualization does not have the nature of seeing things,

original: mngon sum gyis mthong ba las ji ltar yang de nyid las sam ;
analyzed: mngon sum gyis mthong ba las ji ltar yang de nyid las sam ;
translated: because it is not possible that what is seen by direct perception is the same as that, or different from that,

original: gzhan las kyang rung brda'i rjes su 'brangs pa'am cig shos dag gi rnam par brtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las kyang rung brda'i rjes su 'brangs pa'am cig shos dag gi rnam par brtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the influence of conventional symbols, or because of the conceptualization of the other.

original: de skad du yang /üîΩgzung ba 'dzin phyir kun rdzob ni //
analyzed: de skad du yang / gzung ba 'dzin phyir kun rdzob ni //
translated: And it is said:

original: mi 'dod ces gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'dod ces gsungs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe conventional is not accepted as the apprehension of the apprehended.‚Äù

original: de'i de lta bu yang rtag pa las byung ba ma yin te /üîΩrim can min las rim skye med //
analyzed: de'i de lta bu yang rtag pa las byung ba ma yin te / rim can min las rim skye med //
translated: And that is not produced from the permanent,üîΩbecause it is said:

original: ces bya bas 'gegs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya bas 'gegs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no production of a series from the non-series.‚Äù

original: 'di la ni mthong ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i rnam par dbye ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di la ni mthong ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'i rnam par dbye ba yin no //
translated: Here, the analysis of ‚Äúseeing‚Äù is the analysis of the divisions.

original: shes bya ba'i so sor snang ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis de'i bdag nyid mthong ba yang mi rtag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: shes bya ba'i so sor snang ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis de'i bdag nyid mthong ba yang mi rtag pa yin gyi /
translated: The appearance of the object of knowledge as impermanent is the seeing of its nature as impermanent.

original: rtag par 'dzin pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtag par 'dzin pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The apprehension of permanence is taught:

original: shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause the object of knowledge is impermanent...‚Äù and so on.
